62a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po rang gi chos kyi stan las langs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du
62a3(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg go/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem mo/ /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du
62a4(mdo sde): rab tu 'khrugs so/ /'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag spro lags so/ /bde bar gshegs
62a5(mdo sde): pa bdag spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das khyod ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan ba lags kyi steng du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las skyes pa lags na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ltar
62a6(mdo sde): mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni bdud rtsi'i bka' lags na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid pa'i mthu bdag la ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ba lags kyi/ byas pa
62a7(mdo sde): mi gzo bar bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ /khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras kyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang mchog
62b1(mdo sde): dang dam pa dang phul yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do/ /'di ni nga'i ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir khyod kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /dus dus su bsti stang gyis shig /rin po che'i snod du chug la phrag pa la thogs shig /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong sdig
62b2(mdo sde): pa can de dag la yid ma rton cig / rigs kyi bu 'di ni khyod la rjes su bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba de dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu kha rog de skad ma 'dri
62b3(mdo sde): shig / byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/ sems can mang po la sman par bgyid par 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun du bzang po bshad
62b4(mdo sde): kyis nyon cig / 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu 'di dang 'jam dpal dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad yid la byed pa gzhan thong la/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung
62b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de dag nyon cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun du bzang po rab tu byung ba dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa/ khyim la chags pa/ rnyed pa la chags pa/ gtsug lag khang la chags
62b6(mdo sde): pa/ gnas la chags pa/ lhung bzed dang chos gos la chags pa/ khyim sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa de dag 'byung ste/ kun du bzang po mi gti mug pa de dag gi don du ngas mdo 'di yongs su gtad kyis mdo 'di nub par gyur ta re/ de nas phyogs bcu
62b7(mdo sde): nas lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas kyi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs
63a1(mdo sde): 'di yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag la yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bsti stang du bgyi'o/ /btsun par bgyi'o/ /rim gror bgyi'o/ /mchod par bgyi'o/ /rjed par bgyi'o/ /gsol bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
63a2(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag la yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /yon tan pha rol phyin pa de dag gi/ /yon tan kun bshad thams cad nga las nyon/ /nga rgyal
63a3(mdo sde): rgyags dang bag med spang byos la/ /dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis mnyan par gyis/ /ma ga d+hA 'dir shing dbang byang chub drung / /rang byung mi yi seng ge bzhugs zhes grag /ting 'dzin rnam par thar ba mchog la gnas/ /shing rgyal chen po de yi drung na bzhugs/ /phyogs
63a4(mdo sde): bcu'i zhing rdul snyed dang de thabs cig / skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis dpa' bo bskor/ /sangs rgyas phal chen zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin/ /ting 'dzin de la mi yi dbang po gnas/ /mi dbang de ni snyoms par zhugs rtogs nas/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu shar gyi phyogs
63a5(mdo sde): logs nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing bcu rdul snyed lhan cig tu/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams dang rgyal drung 'ongs/ /de bzhin sbyar te phyogs bcu'i zhing kun nas/ /sangs rgyas sras po dpal zhes bya ba kun/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul snyed dang lhan cig tu/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams dang
63a6(mdo sde): lhags par gyur/ /der 'dus gyur nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa/ /'jam dpal grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams la/ /sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal gyis dris/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod gang yon tan ci/ /de nas sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ /rnyog
63a7(mdo sde): pa med pas byang chub yon tan dang / /bde yangs yon tan ldan gyi spyod yul gtsang / /sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris/ /sangs rgyas sras po rnams kyi spyod yul gtsang / /rgyal bas bsten pa bdag gis 'dir smras kyis/ /khyod kyang sangs rgyas sras kyi yon tan
63b1(mdo sde): dang / /spyod pa gang dag yin pa brjod par gyis/ /bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon/ /yon tan mtha' yas ldan de'i yon tan las/ /dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya/ /rgya mtsho'i thig pa bzhin du shin tu chung / /byang chub gzhir gyur pa yi rang byung sems/ /
63b2(mdo sde): thog ma nyid du bskyed pa gang yin pa/ /de yi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas te/ /mtshungs med kyis kyang yongs su brjod mi spyod/ /pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan rnams/ /bskal pa mang por spyad pa ci smos te/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gi/ /yon tan
63b3(mdo sde): chu bo zad par mdzad mi spyod/ /yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las/ /dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod bya ste/ /mkha' la bya rjes 'dra bar chung ba dang / /sa chen rnams las rdul phran gcig dang mtshungs/ /byang chub yon tan gnas kyi sems skye ba/ /rgyu med ma
63b4(mdo sde): yin gyi na ma yin gyi/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos dang dge 'dun la/ /dad dang dang ba bskyed nas sems skye ste/ /de ni 'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang / /bdag la bde dang snyan dang grags phyir min/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bya'i phyir/ /'jig rten phan
63b5(mdo sde): pa byed pa'i sems skye'o/ /rtag tu sems can phan par bya phyir dang / /zhing rnams sbyang dang sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / /chos yongs gzung dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang / /ye shes rnam par sbyang phyir sems de skye/ /rgyal ba kun dang chos dang de bzhin du/ /'phags pa'i
63b6(mdo sde): tshogs la rtag tu dad pa dang / /dang zhing mos dang gus pa rab bskyed nas/ /bla ma gus par mchod phyir sems de skye/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos la dad gyur cing / /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dad byed la/ /byang chub bla na med la dad gyur nas/ /skyes bu chen po rnams kyi
63b7(mdo sde): sems skye'o/ /dad pa'i stobs kyis mi bdag gyur pa rnams/ /bsam yas rgya chen mchod pas mchod byas shing / /chos dang de bzhin mi phyed dge 'dun la/ /bsam yas mchod pas mchod nas sems skye'o/ /dad pa sngon 'dren ma ltar skyed pa ste/ /yon tan thams cad srung
64a1(mdo sde): zhing 'phel bar byed/ /dogs pa sel cing chu bo rnams las sgrol/ /dad pa bde ba'i grong khyer mtshon pa yin/ /dad pa rnyog pa med cing sems dang byed/ /nga rgyal spong zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa gter dang nor dang rkang pa'i mchog /lag pa bzhin du dge sdud
64a2(mdo sde): rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa yongs su gtong la dga' bar byed/ /dad pa rgyal ba'i chos la rab dga' skyed/ /dad pa yon tan ye shes khyad par byed/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang ston cing thob par byed/ /dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal bar byed/ /dad pa'i stobs la gzhan gyis mi rdzi zhing / /nyon
64a3(mdo sde): mongs rnam par sel ba'i gzhi rten yin/ /dad pa rang 'byung yon tan rnams byang tshol/ /dad pa chags pa'i sgo la chags pa med/ /mi dal spangs shing dal ba'i mchog gcig yin/ /dad pa bdud kyi lam las 'da' byed cing / /thar pa'i lam mchog ston par byed pa yin/ /yon
64a4(mdo sde): tan zhing gi sa bon ma rul pa/ /dad pa byang chub zhing ni rnam par skyed/ /ye shes khyad par yon tan 'phel bar byed/ /dad pa rgyal ba thams cad ston pa yin/ /dad pas mos pa'i khyad par dga' rnams kyi/ /de la spyod pa rim gyis brjod par bya/ /'di 'dra'i chos ni 'jig rten rab
64a5(mdo sde): dkon te/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na rin chen rgyal po bzhin/ /gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dad gus pa/ /de dag tshul khrims bslab pa yongs mi 'dor/ /gang dag tshul khrims bslab pa mi 'dor ba/ /yon tan ldan de yon tan ldan pas bstod/ /tshul khrims byang chub sems ston
64a6(mdo sde): byed pa ste/ /slob pa'i sa yi yon tan rnams la sbyor/ /tshul khrims bslab pa 'dor bar mi byed pa/ /de dag rgyal bas bsngags pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ /gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dad gus pa/ /de dag rgyal la mchod pa rgya chen byed/ /gang dag rgyal la mchod pa che byed pa/ /de dag
64a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dad pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag rtag tu chos la dad gus pa/ /de dag rgyal bar chos nyan ngoms pa med/ /gang dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan mi ngoms pa/ /de dag chos la mos pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag rtag tu dge 'dun dad gus pa/ /de dag mi ldog dge
64b1(mdo sde): 'dun dad pa yin/ /gang dag mi ldog dge 'dun rab dad pa/ /de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog 'gyur/ /gang dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog pa/ /de dag dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal/ /gang dag dbang po rno zhing rab gsal ba/ /de dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par
64b2(mdo sde): spangs/ /gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa/ /de dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs su bzung / /gang dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs bzung ba/ /de dag dge ba rgya chen sogs par byed/ /gang dag dge ba rgya chen sogs byed pa/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyu stobs
64b3(mdo sde): ldan/ /bdag nyid chen po rgyu stobs gang ldan pa/ /de dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya chen 'gyur/ /gang dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya che ba/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis rtag byin brlabs/ /gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa/ /de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/ /gang dag
64b4(mdo sde): byang chub don du sems skye ba/ /de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson/ /drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa/ /de dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs su skye/ /gang dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs skyes pa/ /de dag mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor spangs/ /mnyam zhing
64b5(mdo sde): sbyor dang mi sbyor gang spangs pa/ /de dag dad dang bsam pa rnam par dag /gang dag dad dang bsam pa rnam dag pa/ /de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa mchog /gang dag lhag bsam dam pa mchog ldan pa/ /de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa spyod/ /gang dag rtag tu pha rol
64b6(mdo sde): phyin spyod pa/ /de dag theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs/ /gang dag theg pa chen po 'dir zhugs pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rnams la sgrub pas mchod/ /gang dag sgrub pas sangs rgyas mchod byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rjes su dran mi phyed/ /gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran
64b7(mdo sde): mi phyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong / /gang dag sangs rgyas bsam yas rtag mthong ba/ /de la nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/ /gang dag nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/ /de dag bar skabs chos las nyams mi 'gyur/ /gang dag bar
65a1(mdo sde): skabs chos las mi nyams pa/ /de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spobs pa sgrib pa med gyur pa/ /de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas 'gyur/ /gang dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'gro la byams shing phan par 'dod/ /gang dag
65a2(mdo sde): 'gro la byams shing phan 'dod pa/ /de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan/ /gang dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa brtan pa/ /de dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur/ /gang dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang po can/ /de dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bar bor/ /gang dag 'dus byas
65a3(mdo sde): skyon gyis yal bor ba/ /de dag nga rgyal rgyags med bag med min/ /gang dag nga rgyal rgyags med bag med min/ /de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson/ /gang dag rtag tu bdag gzhan don brtson pa/ /de dag 'khor bar yongs su skyo ba med/ /gang dag 'khor bar yongs su
65a4(mdo sde): mi skyo ba/ /de dag rtun pa dam pa mchog dang ldan/ /gang dag rtun pa dam pa mchog ldan pa/ /de dag mngon shes rnam par dag pa skyes/ /gang dag mngon shes rnam par dag skyes pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang po rtogs/ /gang dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang rtogs pa/ /de dag 'gro
65a5(mdo sde): ba yongs su smin byed mkhas/ /'gro ba yongs su smin byed gang mkhas pa/ /de dag 'gro ba sdud shes cho ga mkhas/ /'gro ba sdud shes cho ga su mkhas pa/ /de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson/ /gang dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhir brtson pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i don ni
65a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas byed/ /gang dag 'gro don mtha' yas byed gyur pa/ /de dag shes rab thabs la rten pa yin/ /gang dag shes rab thabs la rten gyur pa/ /dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas/ /dpa' bo gang dag bla med lam gnas pa/ /de dag bdud dpung rnams kyis
65a7(mdo sde): yongs mi tshugs/ /gang dag bdud dpung rnams kyis mi tshugs pa/ /de dag bdud kyi lam las rab tu 'das/ /gang dag bdud kyi lam las rab 'das pa/ /de dag mi ldog sa ni rjes su 'thob/ /gang dag mi ldogs ni thob gyur pa/ /de dag mi skye bzod pa thob pa yin/ /gang
65b1(mdo sde): dag mi skye bzod pa thob gyur pa/ /'jig rten sgron te rgyal bas lung bstan to/ /'jig rten sgron gang rgyal bas lung bstan pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon sum gnas/ /rgyal ba kun dang mngon sum su gnas pa/ /de dag rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga mkhas/ /rgyal gsang rnam
65b2(mdo sde): 'phrul cho ga su mkhas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs pa yin/ /gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa/ /de dag yon tan kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /gang dag yon tan kun gyis legs brgyan pa/ /de dag bsod nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs/ /bsod
65b3(mdo sde): nams mchog gis gang lus rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar/ /gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba/ /de dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams rdzogs/ /gang dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs pa/ /de dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang pos spras/ /
65b4(mdo sde): gang dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang spras pa/ /de dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas so/ /gang dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag 'od bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag 'od las pad ma rnams kyang 'byung / /gang dag
65b5(mdo sde): 'od las pad ma rnams byung ba/ /de dag rgyal gzugs pad ma'i gdan 'khod par/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing / /don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul bar byed/ /gang dag rgyal gzugs pad ma'i gdan 'khod par/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu
65b6(mdo sde): ston byed cing / /don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas so/ /gang dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyu zhing / /bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams ston par byed/ /sems can
65b7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab tshim par byed/ /gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing / /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab tshim byed pa/ /de dag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /gang dag so sor rig shes stobs
66a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /de dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang / /gang dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes 'brang ba/ /de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci
66a2(mdo sde): 'dod par/ /sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston par byed/ /gang dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par/ /sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston byed pa/ /de dag tshig rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ngo / /gang dag tshig rnams rjod par
66a3(mdo sde): byed pa'i tshe/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ba/ /de dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems/ /skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam par shes/ /gang dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems/ /skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam shes pa/ /de dag nam yang
66a4(mdo sde): mi 'chi skye mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin/ /gang dag nam yang mi 'chi mi skye zhing / /nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/ /chos kyis rab tu phye bas 'jig rten rgyu/ /gang dag yon tan chos nyid ye
66a5(mdo sde): shes lus/ /chos kyis rab phye 'jig rten rgyu byed pa/ /de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang / /pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog la gnas/ /gang dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang / /pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog gnas pa/ /de dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul
66a6(mdo sde): dang / /ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes su 'thob/ /gang dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang / /ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes thob pa/ /de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod par byed/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i
66a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod byed pa/ /de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur to/ /gang dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur ba/
66b1(mdo sde): mthu brtan de dag nam mkha' lta bur ni/ /ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun na gnas/ /mthu brtan gang dag nam mkha' lta bur ni/ /ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun gnas pa/ /mtshungs med de dag spyod yul lhar bcas kyi/ /'jig rten rnams kyis shes par yong mi nus/ /
66b2(mdo sde): mtshungs med gang dag spyod yul lhar bcas kyi/ /'jig rten rnams kyis shes par mi nus pa/ /de dag rtun pa kun dang mthong ba dang / /ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod do/ /gang dag rtun pa kun dang mthong ba dang / /ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod pa/ /skyes chen de dag sbyin pa sbyin
66b3(mdo sde): byed kyi/ /sbyin pa thams cad don yod 'gyur ba yin/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag rnams kyi mthus/ /chos kyang gnas shing byams pa nyams mi 'gyur/ /dge ba'i las rnams rab tu spyod 'gyur te/ /dkon mchog mthu yang dam pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje mkhregs pa'i rin chen mchog yod
66b4(mdo sde): pa/ /de yi mthu yis rgya mtshor rin chen rnams/ /mi zad mi 'grib 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan chu/ /gang na sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing gyur pa/ /de ni byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas ston/ /phyogs rnams gang na chos kyang med gyur pa/ /phyogs der chos
66b5(mdo sde): kyi gter ni ston par byed/ /de dag rtog med rnam par mi rtog cing / /de dag lhun gyis grub par phyogs kun du/ /zla ba lta bur snang bar rab ston cing / /thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag skad cig re la phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten kun du byang chub sangs rgyas ston/ /
66b6(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor dang mya ngan 'das zhi dang / /ring bsrel rab tu rgyas pa'ang dpa' bo ston/ /mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyal sa/ /sangs rgyas bkod pa rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /bskal pa bsam mi khyab par ston byed cing / /theg gsum sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mos pa
66b7(mdo sde): kun gyi bsgrub pa shes pa rnams/ /khye'u dang bu mo bud med lus rnams dang / /lha mi lha min klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs rnams ston/ /rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgos/ /dpa' po de dag 'gro ba'i gzugs spyod dang / /rtags dang spyod
67a1(mdo sde): dang sgra skad 'jug pa dag / ji snyed thams cad ma lus ston par byed/ /de dag zhing bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod par byed/ /gang dag zhing bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod byed pa/ /
67a2(mdo sde): de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing / /sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' yas so/ /gang dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing / /sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes bsam yas pa/ /de dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang / /yid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
67a3(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang / /yid kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang / /bzod dang brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang / /bzod brtson
67a4(mdo sde): rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas phal chen ting 'dzin sgos/ /bsam gtan rnam par 'phrul dang shes rab dang / /thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /yon tan kun gyi rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas/ /de dag phra rab rdul 'jug ting nge
67a5(mdo sde): 'dzin/ /rdul rnams kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /rdul gcig steng na zhing rnams bsam mi khyab/ /ston par byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med/ /rdul de'i steng na sangs rgyas bcas zhing dang / /sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing yang kha cig ston/ /nyon mongs rnam dag dog
67a6(mdo sde): pa kha cig dang / /yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston/ /zhing rnams la la 'jig dang 'chags pa dang / /la la spyi'u tshugs gyur dang 'thun pa dang / /la la snrel zhi smig rgyu lta bu dang / /la la mig 'phrul lta bur gyur pa rnams/ /ji ltar rdul gcig steng du ston byed pa/ /
67a7(mdo sde): de bzhin rdul rnams ma lus kun la ston/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste/ /grags pa mtha' yas rnam thar 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag rgyal mchod rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin/ /rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /lag pa'i mthil du stong gsum rgyas
67b1(mdo sde): bkang ste/ /skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed/ /phyogs bcu dag na me tog phreng ba dang / /spos byug rin chen rin che ji snyed pa/ /de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal rnams mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'byin/ /gos dang phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang / /rgyal
67b2(mdo sde): mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang / /gser gyis brgyan pa'i rin chen bla re rnams/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char du 'bebs/ /phyogs bcu dag na yo byad mtha' yas gang / /drang srong chen po rnams la mchod 'os pa/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char 'bebs
67b3(mdo sde): shing / /byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba mchod/ /phyogs rnams dag na rol mo ji snyed pa/ /rnga dang rdza rnga sgra snyan pi bang dang / /sil snyan sgra dang sgra chen gling bu rnams/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrogs/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi dpe zla med rnams kyi/ /yang
67b4(mdo sde): dag yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs dang / /bstod pa'i tshigs bcad sgrub pa sna tshogs pa/ /de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrogs/ /'od zer gang dag las dges yongs bsags pa/ /lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing / /spos chus rgyal ba'i zhing
67b5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad du/ /'bebs shing 'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod/ /'od zer bkod dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i 'od/ /pad ma'i rgyan phreng bsam yas rab 'phyang ba/ /pad ma mtshan rab gzugs can du ma dag /lag nas rgyal ba rnams la mchod par byed/ /me tog
67b6(mdo sde): phal chen me tog bla re dang / /me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /me tog sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /bdug pa phal chen bdug pa'i bla re dang / /bdug pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /bdug pa sna tshogs kun du bkram
67b7(mdo sde): byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phal chen spos dang spos kyi bla re dang / /spos kyis bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /sna tshogs spos rnams kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phreng ba phal chen phreng ba'i bla re dang / /phreng
68a1(mdo sde): ba bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /phreng ba sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phye ma phal chen phye ma'i bla re dang / /phye ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /phye ma sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid
68a2(mdo sde): chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /na bza' phal chen na bza'i bla re dang / /na bza' bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /na bza' sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phal chen gdugs dang gdugs kyi bla re dang / /gdugs kyi
68a3(mdo sde): bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /sna tshogs gdugs rnams kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rin chen phal chen rin chen bla re dang / /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid
68a4(mdo sde): chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /pad ma phal chen pad ma'i bla re dang / /pad ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /pad ma sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rgyan phreng phal chen rgyan phreng bla re dang / /rgyan phreng bkod pa'i 'od zer
68a5(mdo sde): rab bkye ste/ /rgyan phreng sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing / /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rgyal mtshan mchog bkod 'od zer rab bkye zhing / /de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang / /sngo dang rgyal mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa/ /du mas rgyal ba'i zhing
68a6(mdo sde): rnams brgyan par byed/ /nor bu 'dra ba sna tshogs bkod pa'i gdugs/ /dar gyi lda ldi ba dan rab spyangs shing / /dril g.yer dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgrogs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de dag 'dzin/ /lag pa'i mthil nas mchod pa mtha' yas rnams/ /rgyal ba gcig
68a7(mdo sde): la de dag byed pa ltar/ /rgyal ba ma lus kun la'ang de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag 'gro ba sdud pa'i ye shes kyis/ /rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog bsgrubs shing / /bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi sgo/ /thabs stong dag gis sems
68b1(mdo sde): can 'dul bar byed/ /kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang / /sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang / /sbyangs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims kun sgo dang / /bzod pa mi zad mi 'khrugs sgo dag dang / /kha cig brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson sgo dang / /bsam gtan rab
68b2(mdo sde): tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang / /don la rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang / /spyad pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang / /tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag dang mngon shes sgo/ /bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan par 'dod sgo dang / /bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang / /bden dang brten dang
68b3(mdo sde): rnam par thar sgo dang / /kha cig stobs dang dbang po lam sgo dang / /nyan thos theg pas rnam par grol sgo dang / /rkyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang / /theg pa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang / /kha cig mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal sgo/ /kha cig bdag med srog med sgo dag
68b4(mdo sde): dang / /mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral sgo dang / /zhi 'gog ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul/ /'gro ba'i spyod pa'i sgo rnams ji snyed pa/ /de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te/ /de dag kun du rnam thar sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /gang
68b5(mdo sde): dag kun du rnam thar sgo dag nas/ /bsams bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag sus kyang mtshan mar gzung mi nus/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul ba de 'dra'o/ /de dag dga' ba bkod pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /'gro ba thams cad yongs smin 'thun byed pa/
68b6(mdo sde): dga' bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas/ /bsams pa brtan nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /gang du lo nyes 'jig rten yo byad gang / /bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon gyur pa/ /der ni kun gyis bsams bzhin bya ba yin/ /sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams
68b7(mdo sde): byed/ /de dag zas skom mchog dang ro mchog dang / /gos dang bgo ba rin chen sna tshogs dang / /rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas/ /sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed/ /brtan pa de dag mtshan mchog lus spras shing / /gos dang rgyan mchog bgos shing
69a1(mdo sde): brgyan byas te/ /phreng bas spud cing spos kyis bskus pa yi/ /gzugs rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mthong na dga' tshim rab tu dga' rnams la/ /blo mchog de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang ba/ /gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed
69a2(mdo sde): cing / /gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan dang / /khu byug kun la dang pa'i sgra skad dang / /rnga dang tshangs dang mi'am ci yi sgras/ /mos pa kun la de bzhin chos kyang ston/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas/ /rgyal ba gang dag
69a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed/ /don dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de bzhin byed/ /bya ba kun la grogs su 'gyur byas shing / /grogs kyi sgo nas sems
69a4(mdo sde): can 'dul bar byed/ /sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams/ /grogs kyi don du de dag bzod byed cing / /'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du/ /de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len/ /gang na mngon byung med cing chos med de/ /dgon par 'gro dang thar pa mi dmigs pa/ /
69a5(mdo sde): der ni rgyal srid 'byor ba rab spangs te/ /zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung / /de dag khyim dang 'ching dang srid pa'i gnas/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ /'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/ /mngon par byung zhing thar pa rab tu brjod/ /de dag
69a6(mdo sde): spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing / /skyes chen rnams kyi chos spyod gang yin dang / /drang srong rnams kyi spyod kun ma lus par/ yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ /gang na sems can dpag med tshe ldan zhing / /bde dang ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa/ /der ni rga
69a7(mdo sde): bas nyen cing nad bu can/ /bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston/ /'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la/ /'jig rten gti mug me chen rab 'bar zhing / /rga dang na dang 'chi ba rab 'bar ba'i/ /'jig rten bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag sangs rgyas
69b1(mdo sde): stobs bcu brtson bzhi dang / /chos kyi khyad par brgyad rnams kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid rjod byed cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed/ /de dag kun brjod rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas/ /gzugs kyi byin rlabs stobs kyis thams cad du/ /de bzhin
69b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing / /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul/ /de dag thabs tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /'jig rten rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ /'jig rten mi chags chu la pad ma bzhin/ /dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu/ /de
69b3(mdo sde): dag snyan dngags mkhan rgyal snyan dngags sbyor/ /gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan/ /bzhag mdzes rgyan phreng thogs shing gar byed dang / /sgyu ma mkhan po gzugs mang kun du ston/ /grong pa grong dpon kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin ded dpon tshong dpon khyim
69b4(mdo sde): bdag 'gyur/ /rgyal po blon po mdun 'don pho nya dang / /sman pa 'jig rten bstan bcos cho ga mkhan/ /de dag dgon par ljon shing chen por 'gyur/ /sman dang rin chen mi zad gter rnams dang / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dod 'byin sdong po dang / /lam gol dong ba rnams la lam
69b5(mdo sde): ston 'gyur/ /'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing / /sems can las kyi tshul rnams mi shes pa/ /de dag kun la rmos chos tshong thabs dang / /sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten rjod par byed/ /'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba gang / /sems can bde byed mkhas pas
69b6(mdo sde): rab bsngags pa/ /rigs stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs kun/ /drang srong de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod/ /gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten mos 'gyur ba/ /drang srong spyod mchog dam pa gang yin dang / /brtul zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub mchog kun kyang /
69b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod/ /de dag spyod can kun rgyu mu stegs can/ /gdung ba gau ta ma dang mi smrar spyod/ /gcer bu gos med lhur len dge sbyong la/ /mu stegs can gyi slob dpon mkhas par ston/ /de dag kun du 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang / /
70a1(mdo sde): bla na yod dang bla na med rnams dang / /ral pa ring dang gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs can/ /de dag tu yang slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/ /nyi ma'i rjes lta dka' thub lnga ldan dang / /khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs spyod/ /gle'u can dag dang mu stegs sum
70a2(mdo sde): cu pa/ de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/ /lha yi shes la 'jug pa dga' rnams dang / /mu stegs nye reg yul du rgyu rnams su/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu chu spyod gyur nas kyang / /bsam yas chos la de dag dam pa mchog /tsog pur 'dug dang gcig pu rgyu ba
70a3(mdo sde): dang / /tsher ma rtswa dang thal bar nyal ba dang / /gang dag gtun shing mal can gnas pa dang / /de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/ /phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing / /bsnyen dka' mi bzad drag shul
70a4(mdo sde): dka' thub kyis/ /mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bar 'dul/ /'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ /lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can/ /kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs tshul gyis/ /de dag rnams la bden pa ston par byed/ /la lar
70a5(mdo sde): 'gro lding ba yi sngags kyi gzhi/ /shin tu gsang ba'i gzhi yis bden pa ston/ /la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis/ /la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig gis/ /la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang / /don la rnam nges rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang / /rgol ba 'dul ba shes
70a6(mdo sde): ba'i tshig rnams dang / /bstan bcos thub med thar ba'i tshig rnams kyis/ /la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang / /kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams kyis/ /la la dag la lha tshig nges tshig dang / /klu yi nges tshig gnod sbyin nges tshig gis/ /la lar srin po 'byung
70a7(mdo sde): po sha za dang / /dri za grul bum lto 'phye che tshig dang / /mi ci lha min mkha' lding tshig rnams kyis/ /bden pa bstan cing thar bar 'dren par byed/ /de dag bden dang nges tshig tshul shes te/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i/ /chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas
70b1(mdo sde): ston/ /de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// //bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/ /'gro ba kun la mngon bar sgrub byed cing / /'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste/ /'od zer bkye nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mthong na legs
70b2(mdo sde): pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa/ /de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu/ /mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas yongs bstan cing / /chos kyang yongs bstan de lam bstan cing / /rgyal ba'i sku gzugs
70b3(mdo sde): mchod rten bstan byas pas/ /des na mthong legs 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi/ /'od zer 'od byed ces bya rab gtong zhing / /rdul dang mun pa thams cad bsal byas te/ /'jig rten phan pa'i 'od des rab tu snang / /sems can
70b4(mdo sde): gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma 'dzin/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron bzung bas/ /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'bru mar mar me mar gyi mar me dang / /rtswa shing 'dam bu 'od ma'i sgron ma dang / /spos dang
70b5(mdo sde): bcud len rin chen sgron ma dag / rgyal ba rnams la phul nas 'od byed thob/ /sgrol zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /de dag sred yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can bsgral ba'i don du go cha gyon/ /gang dag
70b6(mdo sde): sred yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can bsgral ba'i don du go gyon pa/ /de dag chu bo bzhi las rab tu sgrol/ /mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong khyer ston/ /stegs dang zam pa du ma byas pa dang / /chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru 'byin te/ /'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba
70b7(mdo sde): bsngags byas pas/ /des na sgrol ba'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /skom pa sel ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs shing / /chos la mos pa'i ro ni don tu gnyer/ /'dod pa'i yon
71a1(mdo sde): tan skom pa rab spangs te/ /chos mos ro la don du gnyer gyur pas/ /bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'jig rten skom pa'i sred pa rnam par sel/ /rdzing dang chu klung khron pa chu dong dang / /mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de/ /'dod pa
71a2(mdo sde): smad cing bsam gtan bsngags byas pas/ /des na sred pa sel ba grub par gyur/ /dga' bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /dga' ba rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed
71a3(mdo sde): do/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ /pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa rnams byas shing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan rnams brjod pas/ /des na dga' byed 'od zer grub par gyur/ /mgu bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can
71a4(mdo sde): gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas la ni dga' mgu zhing / /chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu'o/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dga' mgu zhing / /chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu nas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i
71a5(mdo sde): tshogs rnams dang / /rtag tu 'grogs thob bzod pa bla med thob/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas te/ /byang chub sems kyi yon tan rab brjod pas/ /des na mgu byed 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /bsod
71a6(mdo sde): nams bsags pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer zhing / /sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma sbyin par byed/ /gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin de byed tshe/ /slong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas
71a7(mdo sde): te/ /bsam pa thams cad sbyin pa byin byas pas/ /bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /chos gcig sgo mo nas ni du ma yi/ /chos kyi sgo rnams
71b1(mdo sde): yud kyis khong du chud/ /chos kyi dbye ba sems can 'dzin btsud de/ /don la nges pa'i ye shes rnam phye zhing / /chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas na/ /des na ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub/ /shes rab sgron ma'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des
71b2(mdo sde): bskul byas pa/ /stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung zhing / /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug /bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs 'dra zhing / /rmi lam mtshungs la gzugs brnyan 'dra ba dag /bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub
71b3(mdo sde): po/ /chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /mi zad bzod kyi gzungs ni thob gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/ /chos 'dzin rnams la yongs su phan gdags te/ /drang srong
71b4(mdo sde): rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas shing / /'gro ba chos kyis rjes su bsrung byas pas/ /chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can 'jungs pa gang dag des bskul ba/ /longs spyod mi rtag mi brtan
71b5(mdo sde): shes gyur nas/ /de dag rtag tu gtong la dga' mos 'gyur/ /ma dul gdul dka'i sems can ser sna can/ /nor rnams rmi lam sprin dang 'drar shes nas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin ba spel byas pas/ /des na stong dang ldan pa'i 'od grub po/ /yongs su
71b6(mdo sde): gdung med 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /khrims 'chal sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag la gnas gyur nas/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/ /dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang / /tshul khrims la yang
71b7(mdo sde): sems can mang 'dzud cing / /byang chub sems kyang yang dag 'dzin 'jug pas/ /yongs gdung med pa'i 'od zer de grub po/ /bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /mi bzod sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /khro dang tha ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing / /
72a1(mdo sde): de dag rtag tu bzod mos dga' bar 'gyur/ /sdig ldan rnams kyi nyes byas bzod byas te/ /byang chub don du 'khrugs pa ma byas shing / /bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu bsngags brjod pas/ /des na bzod pa bkod pa de grub po/ /sbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong
72a2(mdo sde): zhing / /le lo'i sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas/ /de dag bdud bzhi'i lam
72a3(mdo sde): las rab 'das te/ /byang chub bla med myur du reg par 'gyur/ /sems can mang po brtson 'grus 'dzin bcug ste/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas/ /zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs bzung bas/ /des na sbyangs dang ldan ba'i 'od thob bo/ /zhi bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab
72a4(mdo sde): gtong zhing / /rnam 'khrugs sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /de dag chags med sdang med rmongs med cing / /rtogs par gyur nas mnyam gzhag sems su 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po skyon ldan spyod can dang / /'dre ba yongs su rnam par spang byas te/ /dgon par rab zhi bsam
72a5(mdo sde): gtan bsngags brjod pas/ /des na zhi bar byed pa'i 'od grub bo/ /shes rab bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /shes 'chal sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /bden dang brtan dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang / /dbang po shes pa rtogs par khong chud 'gyur/ /bden dang brtan
72a6(mdo sde): dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang / /dbang po shes pa rtogs par khong chud cing / /nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas/ /shes rab snang bar mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs btang ste/ /byang chub don du chos gang btsal byas pa/ /chos de gus par
72a7(mdo sde): byas nas rab bshad pas/ /shes rab bkod pa'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma bsam yas rnams/ /pad ma dam pa rnams la bzhugs par mthong / /sangs
72b1(mdo sde): rgyas che dang sangs rgyas rnam thar dang / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas brjod byas shing / /sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rab brjod pas/ /de nas sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /'jigs nyen sems can gang
72b2(mdo sde): dag des reg pa/ /'byung po gza' dang gsad brdeg bcing ba dang / /nad 'go 'jigs pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can gang bskyabs dang / /srog chags gsod las bzlog pa byas pa dang / /'jigs pa skyabs tshol rnams la skyabs byas pas/ /
72b3(mdo sde): mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer des grub bo/ /bde ba kun byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /nad pa na ba gang dag des reg pa/ /rnam pa kun du nad kyi sdug bsngal thar/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob/ /nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang / /rin chen bcud len
72b4(mdo sde): spos dang byug pa dang / /bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang / /'bru mar zas skom byin pas de thob bo/ /sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /tshe zad tha mar gang dag des bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag shi 'phos sangs
72b5(mdo sde): rgyas bzhugs zhing 'gro/ /'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te/ /dga' byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing / /'chi kar sangs rgyas skyabs su gtong brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer de thob bo/ /chos rab rjod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /
72b6(mdo sde): sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /chos nyan klog cing yi ger 'dri bar byed/ /de dag rtag tu chos la dga' mos 'gyur/ /chos kyi mu ge byung tshe chos brjod de/ /chos tshol rnams kyi bsam ba rdzogs byas shing / /'dun pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis zhes/ /brjod
72b7(mdo sde): pas chos rab brjod pa de thob bo/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir/ /dbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /'jig rten gsum na sgra rgyud ji snyed pa/ /kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos/ /gsang bstod sgra yis drang srong che bstod de/ /rgyal
73a1(mdo sde): ba'i gsung sgra don du sil snyan dang / /sgra chen dril bu sbyin rnams 'gro kun la/ /rab tu bsgrags pas dbyangs ldan 'od grub bo/ /'chi med sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /bag med spyod pa thams cad rab spangs te/ /
73a2(mdo sde): yon tan kun la brtson pa nyams su len/ /'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/ /sdug bsngal 'tshe ba du mas yongs su gang / /'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi skyid ces/ /brjod pas 'chi med sbyin ba de thob bo/ /khyad par ldan ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od
73a3(mdo sde): des bskul byas pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi tshul khrims khyad par dang / /ting 'dzin khyad par shes rab khyad par thos/ /thub chen rgyal po'i khrims kyis mchog gyur cing / /ting 'dzin mchog dang shes rab mchog gyur ces/ /byang chub don du bstod cing bsngags brjod pas/ /
73a4(mdo sde): des na khyad par ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /rin chen mi zad gter rnams thob gyur nas/ /drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten rin chen phul/ /skye
73a5(mdo sde): bo nyon mongs rin chen rnams kyis bsdus/ /rgyal ba rnams la rin chen rab phul bas/ /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /spos rab snang ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /mi la med spos yid 'ong tshor gyur nas/ /
73a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur/ /mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/ /mi yi gtso la mchod par rab byas te/ /spos las rgyal ba'i gzugs dang mchod rten dag /byas pas spos rab snang ba de grub bo/ /sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /rgyal mtshan
73a7(mdo sde): ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang / /sil snyan bsgrags shing spos kyis bdug pa yis/ /pho brang dam pa mdzes byas me tog bkram/ /sil snyan dag gis rgyal ba rnams bsu zhing / /me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang / /rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog rnams
73b1(mdo sde): kyis mchod/ /des na sna tshogs bkod pa grub par gyur/ /shin tu dang byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed/ /mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyangs byas pas/ /des na shin tu dang ba'i 'od grub bo/ /sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong
73b2(mdo sde): zhing / /spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun du gnas/ /mchod rten 'khor sar spos kyi chus btab pas/ /sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od de rab tu thob/ /lhab lhub bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /gcer bu gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gos dang bgo ba rgyan phreng sna tshogs
73b3(mdo sde): dag / sbyin pa byas pas lhab lhub bkod pa grub/ /ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /bkres pa kha zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur/ /zas dang skom dang ro mchog sna tshogs rnams/ /byin pas ro mchog ldan ba'i 'od grub bo/ /nor rnams ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong
73b4(mdo sde): zhing / /dbul po dag gis rin chen gter rnams 'thob/ /dkon mchog gsum la gter gzhi mi zad pa/ /dbul ba byas pas nor ston 'od thob bo/ /mig rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /de tshe long bas sna tshogs gzugs rnams mthong / /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i
73b5(mdo sde): mchod rten la/ /mar me phul bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub/ /rna ba rnam sbyong 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /rna ba nyams pas sgra mang thos par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /sil snyan phul bas rna sbyong 'od zer grub/ /sna rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong
73b6(mdo sde): zhing / /sngon chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /spos rab phul bas sna sbyong 'od zer grub/ /lce rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sgra snyan yid 'ong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bstod/ /mi snyan brlang bar smra
73b7(mdo sde): ba rnam spangs te/ /'jam par smras pas lce sbyong 'od zer grub/ /lus rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /lus btud byas pas lus rnam sbyong ba thob/ /sems
74a1(mdo sde): rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /smyos pa thams cad sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dbang rjes sems 'gro byas pas na/ /sems rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /gzugs rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /mi dbang rnams kyi
74a2(mdo sde): bsam yas sku mthong ste/ /sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang / /mchod rten brgyan byas gzugs sbyong 'od grub bo/ /sgra rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /sgra ni sgra mi stong par rab tu shes/ /rkyen las byung bas brag ca 'dra'o zhes/ /sgra rnams bstan pas 'od
74a3(mdo sde): zer de grub bo/ /dri rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dring thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur/ /spos rab mchog chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag /khrus byas byang chub zhing gi 'od de yin/ /ro bro sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /dug can dug med ro yi
74a4(mdo sde): mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/ /ro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin/ /reg rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / /reg na rtsub pa 'jam zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /mdung thung rtse gsum ral gri mda' chen char/ /phreng ba
74a5(mdo sde): 'jam pa pad ma ud pal 'gyur/ /bcos bu'i ras mang 'jam zhing reg bde rnams/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs shul bting bkram ste/ /me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam rnams dang / /phreng ba bla re phul ba'i 'od de yin/ /chos rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab
74a6(mdo sde): gtong zhing / /'jig rten phan mdzad rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /spu rnams kun nas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/ /byung ba thos nas mos pa thams cad tshim/ /rkyen las byung ba ma skyes ngo bo nyid/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni chos sku ste/ /chos nyid mkha' bzhin rtag tu
74a7(mdo sde): gnas so zhes/ /brjod pas chos rnams sbyong ba thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa/ /drang srong rnams kyi spu yi sgo gcig nas/ /'od zer gang gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ste/ /kun kyang las sbyor tha dad tshul can no/ /ji ltar de dag spu yi sgo gcig nas/ /
74b1(mdo sde): 'od zer gang gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ba/ /ma lus spu rnams kun nas de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /yon tan gang gis 'od zer gang grub pa'i/ /yon tan de grogs sngon chad gang gyur pa/ /de dag nyid las 'od zer rab 'byung ste/ /drang srong ye
74b2(mdo sde): shes rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag bsod nams sngon grogs gang yin la/ /rjes su yi rang gsol ba sus btab dang / /gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa/ /de dag kun gyis 'od zer de dag shes/ /gang dag bsod nams byas shing dge bsags dang / /
74b3(mdo sde): gang dag yang yang sangs rgyas rnams mchod cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan 'dun te don gnyer ba/ /de dag kun la 'od zer de dag bskul/ /dper na dmus long nyi ma mi mthong yang / /de med ma yin 'jig rten dag tu 'char/ /mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur
74b4(mdo sde): nas/ /kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug /de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kun/ /rab tu 'byung yang log pas nyen gyur cing / /mos nyams phal pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/ /dper rgyan nor bu bzhon pa
74b5(mdo sde): gzhal med khang / /bcud kyis len dang rin chen byug pa spos/ /de dag skye bo che la yod mod kyi/ /phongs par gyur pa rnams la de dag med/ /de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag mod/ /de dag yod kyang log pas nyen gyur cing / /mos pa nyams pa rnams kyis
74b6(mdo sde): mi mthong ste/ /blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/ /gang dag 'od zer dbye ba 'di thos nas/ /dad cing mos la dang ba skyes gyur na/ /bdag ni yon tan cher 'gyur mi 'gyur zhes/ /de dag dogs dang som nyi mi skyed do/ /de dag g.yog 'khor bkod pa rnam
74b7(mdo sde): 'phrul ba/ /ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par grub byed cing / /phyogs bcu kun du do zla med rnams kyi/ /zham ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston par byed/ /'od bkod de dag pad ma sna tshogs pa/ /stong gsum tshad tsam byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /skyil krung
75a1(mdo sde): bcas pa'i lus kyis kun khyab ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad ma gzhan/ /'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs byas shing / /sangs rgyas sras kyis thams cad yongs su bskor/ /de dag ting 'dzin
75a2(mdo sde): ting 'dzin med par gnas/ /drang srong de yis sems can gang dag rnams/ /yongs su smin byas sangs rgyas legs bsgrubs pa/ /de dag pad ma chen po de bskor cing / /kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod/ /gang dag ting 'dzin gnas par rab zhugs pa/ /skyes
75a3(mdo sde): chen rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin te/ /rang gi slob mas kun kyang yongs bskor nas/ /skar ma'i tshogs kyis zla ba bskor ba bzhin/ /de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig rab 'jug cing / /zhabs 'bring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa/ /de bzhin phyogs rnams ma lus
75a4(mdo sde): kun du ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab gnas pa'i/ /ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing / /kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig ldang bar yang / /phyogs bcu kun du rang gi lus ston to/ /de dag shar gyi phyogs
75a5(mdo sde): su mnyam bzhag cing / /nub kyi phyogs nas dpa' bo rnam par ldang / /nub kyi phyogs su mnyam bar bzhag gyur cing / /bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang / /de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu 'jug /gzhan gyi phyogs su mnyam bar bzhag
75a6(mdo sde): gyur la/ /ye shes yon tan phyug po gzhan nas ldang / /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/ /grangs med ma lus dag na rang byung ba/ /de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/ /zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
75a7(mdo sde): gnas par snang / /phyogs der mnyam par bzhag par bstan byas nas/ /dpa' bo nub kyi zhing rnams ma lus par/ /rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la/ /mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang / /nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/ /grangs med
75b1(mdo sde): ma lus dag na bzhugs sangs rgyas/ /de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/ /zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang / /phyogs der mnyam par bzhag par bstan byas nas/ /dpa' bo shar gyi zhing rnams ma lus par/ /rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum
75b2(mdo sde): rgyal kun la/ /mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang / /de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/ /phyogs rnams ma lus kun du brtan pa 'jug /kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig langs gyur cing / /'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod byed snang / /de dag
75b3(mdo sde): mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /gzugs kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ston pa na/ /de la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur/ /gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur la/ /mig ni ma skyes ma
75b4(mdo sde): byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /sgra yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /sgra dang skad
75b5(mdo sde): rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/ /sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /rna ba'i lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag sna yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /
75b6(mdo sde): dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /dri mchog dam pa 'jug par rab tu zhugs/ /dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med pa rab
75b7(mdo sde): ston cing / /sna yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag lce yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /ro mchog kun gyi lam nas rnam par ldang / /gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid chen po ro mchog rnams dang ldan/ /
76a1(mdo sde): ro mchog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /lce yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /reg pa'i lam nas
76a2(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten bde ba skyed pa'i reg la zhugs/ /reg pa'i lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /
76a3(mdo sde): lus kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /chos kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /chos la gnas pa'i 'jug pa rab tu zhugs/ /chos lam
76a4(mdo sde): rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /sems kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag byis pa'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /lang tsho shugs la gnas pa rnams las
76a5(mdo sde): ldang / /lang tsho shugs gnas rnams la mnyam bzhag cing / /rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus las rnam par ldang / /rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dad pa'i dge bsnyen ma yi lus las ldang / /dge bsnyen dad ma'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dad pa'i dge
76a6(mdo sde): bsnyen lus las rnam par ldang / /dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dge slong ma yi lus las rnam par ldang / /dge slong ma yi lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus las ldang / /dge slong mang thos lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /slob
76a7(mdo sde): dngami slob lus las rnam par ldang / /slob dang mi slob lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus las rnam par ldang / /rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /sangs rgyas sku mchog rab las rnam par ldang / /sangs rgyas sku
76b1(mdo sde): mchog rab la mnyam bzhag cing / /lha yi lus gzugs las ni rnam par ldang / /lha yi lus gzugs la ni mnyam bzhag cing / /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu yi lus las ldang / /rdzu 'phrul klu yi lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus las rnam par
76b2(mdo sde): ldang / /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /'byung po kun gyi lus las rnam par ldang / /'byung po kun gyi lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /spu yi sgo gcig nas ni rnam par ldang / /spu sgo gcig la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /spu sgo thams
76b3(mdo sde): cad nas ni rnam par ldang / /spu sgo kun la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /skra rtse gcig gi khyon las rnam par ldang / /skra rtse gcig gi khyon la mnyam bzhag cing / /skra rtse kun gyi khyon las rnam par ldang / /skra rtse kun gyi khyon la mnyam bzhag cing / /
76b4(mdo sde): phra rab rdul gyi rdul las de dag ldang / /rdul gcig la ni mnyam bar bzhag gyur cing / /ma lus rdul rnams kun las rnam par ldang / /rdul rnams ma lus kun la mnyam bzhag cing / /rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang / /rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i
76b5(mdo sde): gzhi la mnyam bzhag cing / /nor bu'i shing tog dag las rnam par ldang / /shing tog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur nas/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od zer sgo nas ldang / /rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgo la mnyam bzhag cing / /rgya mtsho'i chu yi chu klung rnams las
76b6(mdo sde): ldang / /rgya mtsho'i chu klung rnams la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid chen po me yi lam nas ldang / /me yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /rlung gi lam las dran ldan rnam par ldang / /rlung gi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /bdag nyid chen
76b7(mdo sde): bo sa yi gzhi las ldang / /sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /lha kun gzhal med khang las rnam par ldang / /lha kun gzhal med khang la mnyam bzhag cing / /dran ldan de dag mkha' las rnam par ldang / /yon tan bsam yas bsags pa de dag
77a1(mdo sde): gi/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su/ /bshad pa mdzad kyang zad par mdzad mi spyod/ /'gro las rnam smin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gsungs pa ni/ /klu yi rnam 'phrul
77a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang / /bsam byed bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /de dag la yang dpe bstan brjod par bya/ /de dag 'dra ba'i dpe zla cang med de/ /mkhas shing rig pa'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis/ /bstan na myur du don rnams shes par 'gyur/ /rnam
77a3(mdo sde): thar brgyad kyi dbang la gnas pa yi/ /nyan thos gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur/ /mang por gyur nas phyir yang gcig gyur te/ /mkha' la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar bar byed/ /smad nas me 'bar stod nas chu yi rgyun/ /stod nas me 'bar smad nas chu yi
77a4(mdo sde): rgyun/ /'gro dang 'greng dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang / /lus 'phrul skad cig gcig la bsam mi khyab/ /de ni snying rje che dang mi ldan zhing / /byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal 'dor yang / /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /'jig rten phan 'dod
77a5(mdo sde): ci phyir ston mi byed/ /nyi zla mkha' la rnam par rgyu 'dod zhing / /phyogs rnams kun gyi chu yi dngo dag dang / /mtsho mtshe'u mtsho bran snong dang rin chen dang / /rgya mtsho chu klung rnams su gzugs brnyan ston/ /de bzhin gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /
77a6(mdo sde): skyes bu dpa' bo phyogs bcu kun du ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dbang / /dang ba'i mtsho la yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag /de dag so sor rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong / /ral gri mda' chen gzhu dang
77a7(mdo sde): mda' rnams dang / /go gyon bzhon dang theg par bcas su mthong / /gang gi gzugs gang gnas gang cha byad gang / /de dang de dag de ltar chu las mthong / /'on kyang chu la byams sdang rnam rtog med/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /
77b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra ldan zhes bya ba/ /sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes rnams kyi/ /sgra yi yan lag dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas te/ /rang gi skad kyis skad kun tshim par byed/ /sgra ldan chags sdang gti mug can de yang / /skad rnams kun gyi sgra yi tshul mkhas na/ /
77b2(mdo sde): gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten ci phyir mgu mi byed/ /tum bu ru yi chung ma dbyangs ldan ma/ /tshangs pa'i bu mo yid las byung ba de/ /bden dang dam bcas mi 'tshe dga' rnams kyi/ /sems dang yid dang kha yi sgor
77b3(mdo sde): 'jug ste/ /dbyangs ldan chags can zhe sdang can de yang / /brtul zhugs grub 'thun dbyangs kyi yan lag gi/ /yid 'ong skad kyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/ /ye shes yon tan phyug rnams cis mi byed/ /rig sngags tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni/ /
77b4(mdo sde): sna tshogs gzugs mang mtha' yas ston par byed/ /nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang / /khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston/ /'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang / /sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/ /bsam gtan
77b5(mdo sde): mngon shes rnam thar rab bslabs pa/ /spyod tshul mkhas rnams ci phyir mgu mi byed/ /lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe/ /rgyal ldan lha yis lha min pham byas na/ /de dag 'jigs pas gdugs bcas bzhin bcas shing / /theg bcas dmag bcas
77b6(mdo sde): go gyon bzhin du 'byer/ /'dod chags sdang ldan lha dbang de dag kyang / /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' bo rnams/ /lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i glang bo sa srung bu/ /
77b7(mdo sde): dbang po'i 'khor gyur rdzu 'phrul chen po de/ /mgo bo sum cu rtsa gsum mngon sprul cing / /mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste/ /mche ba de dag so so re re la'ang / /rdzing bu chus gang bdun bdun sprul pa byed/ /rdzing re la yang pad ma
78a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs pa/ /rnam par bkod pa bdun bdun sprul pa byed/ /pad ma re re'ang lha yi bu mo dag /sgyu rtsal kun shes bdun bdun sprul pa byed/ /de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse/ /glang po de yang
78a2(mdo sde): lus ni bsgyur byas te/ /lha rnams kun dang 'grogs shing 'dre bar byed/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun kyang 'thun/ /glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul de ltar snang / /glang po chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang / /'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na/ /
78a3(mdo sde): shes rab thabs kyi stobs la sbyangs pa rnams/ /ting 'dzin brgya yis rnam 'phrul cis mi byed/ /sgra gcan ji ltar 'dod bzhin lus 'phrul te/ /rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa 'jog byed cing / /rgya mtsho lte bar phyin pa tsam du ston/ /ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi
78a4(mdo sde): mgo yang snyoms/ /sgra gcan chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang / /'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na/ /'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams rab 'joms pa/ /rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci phyir ston mi byed/ /brgya byin rnam 'phrul bsam yas rab snang ste/ /
78a5(mdo sde): lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /lha min bye ba 'phyes pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus las sprul/ /lha min dbang dang lha min phal kun gyis/ /brgya byin rang rang mdun na 'dug par shes/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung ngo zhes/ /lha
78a6(mdo sde): min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos gyur/ /'jigs par byed pa'i mig stong rab bstan te/ /rdo rje me lce 'bar ba thogs byed cing / /lus la go bgos gzi brjid bsnyen dka' ba'i/ /brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer/ /de yang bsod
78a7(mdo sde): nams phal pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ /lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur pa/ /bsod nams mi zad rnams lta cis mi 'phrul/ /lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga/ /lha las rnam par smin pas grub
78b1(mdo sde): gyur pa/ /lha rnams bag med gnas par shes gyur nas/ /rnga de nam mkha' las ni sgra sgrogs te/ /'dod pa thams cad mi rtag ther zug min/ /tha shal mi brtan dbu ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs shing 'dra/ /srid pa thams
78b2(mdo sde): cad rmi lam sprin dang mtshungs/ /bag med thams cad dgrar bcas mya ngan can/ /'chi ba'i lam yin mi 'chi lam ma yin/ /ji snyed su dag bag med gnas gyur pa/ /de dag 'chi bdag chu srin chen pos zin/ /sdug bsngal rtsa ba yongs 'dzin
78b3(mdo sde): thams cad yin/ /skye ba thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyis smad/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyi yul la rmongs/ /chos kyi stobs la rtag dga' gyis zhes bskul/ /rnga des bskul nas brgya byin lha rnams dang / /lha yi 'dun sa chos
78b4(mdo sde): bzang 'dug nas su/ /gtam gang zhi zhing 'dod chags bral 'thun pa/ /chos kyi gtam de lha rnams kun la brjod/ /rnga de gzugs med bstan du mi rung yang / /de ltar rnga sgras don chen rab byed na/ /bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs ni yongs ston
78b5(mdo sde): rnams/ /'gro ba kun gyi don chen cis mi byed/ /lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis/ /lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i rnga yi sgra/ /lha rnams ma 'jigs shig ces sgra 'byin te/ /rnga yis
78b6(mdo sde): bskul nas lha rnams rab dga' zhing / /skrag pa med de stobs kyang skyes par gyur/ /lha min dbang po skrag pas nyen pa rnams/ /'jigs nas dmag bcas de yi mod la 'byer/ /de ltar sgra skad 'byin pa'i rnga 'dra ba/ /'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang
78b7(mdo sde): dpung gnyen po/ /nyon mongs bdud bcom snying rje che ldan rnams/ /zhi ba'i sgra bsgrags nyon mongs sel bar byed/ /dbang po'i lha yi bu mo dgu bcu gnyis/ /dbang po'i sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur/ /gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin
79a1(mdo sde): rtse bar shes/ /gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no/ /lha mo kun dang dka' bar gnas snang yang / /chos bzang 'dun sa na yang de bzhin 'dug /lha rnams kun la chos rab ston snang zhing / /brgya byin skad cig gcig la rnam par 'phrul/ /
79a2(mdo sde): brgya byin chags sdang gti mug ldan pa yang / /sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na/ /'gro don mi skyo sbyor rnams ci yi phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten mgu mi byed/ /bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba/ /de yi dbang du
79a3(mdo sde): sems can 'di kun 'dod/ /las dang nyon mongs kun du zhugs pa yis/ /so so'i skye bo thams cad bdud des bcings/ /chags sdang gti mug ldan pa'i bdud de yang / /'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur byed na/ /dbang bcu dbang thob rnams lta ci
79a4(mdo sde): smos te/ /'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi 'jog /stong gsum gnas kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang / /stong gsum tshangs gnas ji snyed yod pa na/ /de dag kun na 'dug par rab snang zhing / /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu yid 'ong sgrogs/ /tshangs de
79a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rnam par 'phrul byed na/ /'jig rten rab 'das bla na med pa yi/ /bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cis mi 'phrul/ /dbang phyug chen po'i shes pa'i rnam 'phrul ltos/ /rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char thigs rab bkye
79a6(mdo sde): ba/ /skad cig gcig la thams cad 'grang ba byed/ /thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma shes de med na/ /bslab pa bskal pa bsam yas rab bslabs te/ /byang chub bla med ye shes thob pa rnams/ /ci phyir skad cig gcig la sems kyis ni/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems
79a7(mdo sde): mi shes/ /sems can las smin bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /'jig rten 'di kun rlung las yongs su byung / /rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med khang / /rin chen rnam phye sa bon bkram pa'ang byung / /rlung las sprin byung char pa'ang kun du 'bab/ /rlung gis sprin kyang rab tu zhi
79b1(mdo sde): bar byed/ /'jig rten lo tog 'phel ba'ang rlung byed de/ /rlung ni 'gro ba kun la phan pa skyed/ /rlung de pha rol phyin la ma bslabs shing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la ma bslabs kyang / /'jig rten rnam smin bsam yas ston byed na/ /dam pa thob rnams ci phyir ston mi byed/ /
79b2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi chu tshogs ni/ /bya skad skad dang skyes pa dang / /bud med bu mo khye'u skad ci snyed pa/ /kun gyi sgra snyan sems can rnams la sgrogs/ /de ltar sgra snyan rang bzhin med shes nas/ /sgrib pa med pa'i spobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /'gro ba kun
79b3(mdo sde): la sgra snyan brjod byas nas/ /yid 'ong sgra yis 'jig rten mgu bar byed/ /rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /'gro kun rgya dang mtshungs pas rgya mtsho ste/ /chu dang 'byung po rin chen yong mi zad/ /chu rnams bzung pas ngoms par 'gyur ba med/ /de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgya 'dra
79b4(mdo sde): ste/ /bsod nams bsam gtan rnam par thar rnams dang / /shes rab ye shes yon tan kun mi zad/ /bsod nams yon tan sogs pas ngoms pa med/ /rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam par rtse ba na/ /sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar/ /gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas 'gengs
79b5(mdo sde): te/ /de dag kun kyang sna tshogs bkod pa mang / /de ni dbang sgyur gnas su 'dzam gling gi/ /gser gyi mdog gi sprin rnams rnam par sgrub/ /'phrul dgar mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu/ /dga' ldan gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog /'thab bral gnas su mthon mthing bai dUr+ya/ /sum cu rtsa gsum rdo yi snying
79b6(mdo sde): po 'dra/ /skyong ba'i gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu/ /rgya mtshor rdo rje mi phyed mkhregs 'dra ba/ /mi ci gnas su spos mchog 'khrigs lta bu/ /klu yi gnas su pad ma'i mdog 'dra ba/ /gsang ba'i gnas su ngang pa bya gar mdog /lha min gnas su ri brag mdog 'dra ba/ /byang du gser gyi
79b7(mdo sde): 'od zer mdog ston te/ /gling rnams gzhan du sna tshogs bkod pa ston/ /'dzam bu'i gling du ri sngon 'dra ba ste/ /gang na ci mtho sprin rnams de bzhin no/ /dbang sgyur gnas su gser sprin nges bstan nas/ /nyi ma'i mdog 'dra glog kyang rab tu 'gyed/ /'phrul dga'i gnas su zla 'od bzang
80a1(mdo sde): 'dra dang / /dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog 'dra/ /'thab bral gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog /sum cu rtsa gsum gser gyi 'od zer 'dra/ /skyong ba'i gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /rgya mtshor mu tig dmar po'i mdog 'dra bkod/ /mi ci gnas su
80a2(mdo sde): mthon mthing bai dUr+ya/ /klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /gsang ba'i gnas su shel gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /lha min gnas su rdo yi snying po 'dra/ /byang du nor bu skar mdog kha dog 'dra/ /gling gzhan rnams su'ang bkod pa gzhan dang gzhan/ /'dzam bu'i gling du zla ba'i nor bu
80a3(mdo sde): 'bar/ /sprin gyi mtshan nyid 'thun pa'i glog kyang 'gyed/ /de ni dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs sgra sgrogs/ /'phrul dga' gnas su rnga sgra sgrog par byed/ /dga' ldan gnas su sil snyan rol mo'i sgra/ /'thab bral gnas su lha yi bu mo'i sgra/ /sum cu gsum du mi ci mang po'i
80a4(mdo sde): skad/ /skyong ba'i gnas su dri za'i skad du ste/ /rgya mtshor ri 'thab sgra skad 'dra ba'o/ /mi ci gnas su gling bu ku nal sgra/ /klu yi gnas su ka la ping ka'i sgra/ /gsang ba'i gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra/ /lha min gnas su lha yi rdza rnga'i sgra/ /mi yi gnas su rgya mtsho gling bu'i sgra/ /
80a5(mdo sde): de ni dbang sgyur gnas su lha spos zhim/ /me tog sna tshogs bkod pa'i char yang 'bebs/ /'phrul dgar zla ba zla 'dra ba yi/ /me tog man dAr phreng dang byug pa 'bebs/ /dga' ldan gnas su nor bu chen po'i mdog /rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang / /gtsug
80a6(mdo sde): gi nor bu zla ba 'dra ba dang / /gser mdog 'dra ba'i dar la'i char yang 'bebs/ /rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan sna tshogs dang / /phreng ba rnams dang rgyan dang byug pa dang / /mu tig dmar dang gser dang dar la dang / /sil snyan yid 'ong 'thab bral gnas su 'bebs/ /sum cu
80a7(mdo sde): gsum du yid bzhin nor bu mchog / skyong ba'i gnas su tsan dan snying po'i mchog /gur gum sil ma lha shing ta ma la/ /spos chu'i rgyun dang me tog rab tu 'bebs/ /skyong ba'i gnas su klu yi dbang po de/ /nyam stobs skye ba'i kha zas skom gyi rnams/ /kha dog dri zhim ro dang
80b1(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / /de min rin chen bsam yas char yang 'bebs/ /de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun du yang / /char rgyun mi 'chad gnya' shing tsam dag dang / /rnam rgyal chen po mdzod rnams mi zad pa/ /rin chen bkod pa mtha' yas char yang 'bebs/ /mi ci gnas su rgyan phreng sna
80b2(mdo sde): tshogs dang / /pad ma ud pal ras dang rin chen dang / /me tog bar sha ma li phye ma spos/ /pi bang gling bu sgra snyan rdza rnga 'bebs/ /klu yi gnas su mu tig dmar po ste/ /gsang bar nor bu rin chen skar mdog 'dra/ /lha min gnas su ral gri mda' chen dang / /dgrar 'dul
80b3(mdo sde): gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char pa 'bebs/ /byang du de ni rgyal phreng rin chen dang / /me tog bar sha ma li tsam pa'i phreng / /ku ran gtsang dang a ti mug ta 'bebs/ /gling gzhan rnams su'ang sna tshogs char pa 'bebs/ /'dzam bu'i gling du chu gsal dang ba yi/ /char rnams chos bzhin
80b4(mdo sde): phra ba'i rgyun du 'bebs/ /me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos dang shing / /lo tog bde byed 'jig rten rnams su skyed/ /de ltar sprin bkod bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /glog 'byin 'brug sgrogs bkod pa'i char 'bebs kyang / /gnas nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med/ /klu yi rnam 'phrul
80b5(mdo sde): de ltar bsam mi khyab/ /rgya mtsho'i chu na gnas pa de ltar yang / /klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /chos kyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan phyug /rnam 'phrul bsam yas ci phyir ston mi byed/ /bag tsam smos pa'i dpe tshul 'di dag gis/ /skyes chen de dag rnams kyi brjod
80b6(mdo sde): pa byas/ /dpa' bo de dag dpe rnams kun dang bral/ /de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang bsgyur ro/ /blo gros dam pa blo gros rgya chen ldan/ /ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can/ /ye shes mchog ldan khyad par blo can gyi/ /rnam thar mchog rnams 'di lta rnams kyis bshad/ /rnam
80b7(mdo sde): thar dam pa 'di dag sus thos nas/ /yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog byed pa/ /de dag ngo mtshar rmad byung chos ldan te/ /de dag dga' byed mi yi 'jig rten na/ /'di 'dra'i chos 'dir gang dag dad gyur pa/ /sems can so so'i skye bo'i tshogs na dkon/ /gang dag dge
81a1(mdo sde): bsags bsod nams byas gyur pa/ /de dag rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la dad/ /gang dag nyan thos theg pa'ang yid ches pa'i/ /mi dag mi yi 'jig rten rnams na nyung / /de bas rkyen gyi theg par rab tu nyung / /theg pa chen por de dag de bas nyung / /theg pa che la
81a2(mdo sde): zhugs pa de dkon te/ /gang dag chos 'dir dad pa'ang rab dkon na/ /'jug cing 'dzin pa smos kyang ci dgos te/ /gang dag de bzhin sgrub pa smos ci dgos/ /gang dag stong gsum ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /phyi ma'i bskal par mgo bos 'deg byed kyang / /chos 'dir dad pa'i bya
81a3(mdo sde): dka' ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin/ /la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can la/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang / /chos 'dir dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med/ /la las zhing bcu ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /
81a4(mdo sde): lag pa'i mthil du bskal par mkhar 'dzin kyang / /chos 'dir dad pa'i bya dka' ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin/ /la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can la/ /dge ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang / /chos 'dir dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /
81a5(mdo sde): bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med/ /la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur bas/ /gang gis chos kyi le'u 'di gzung byas pa/ /bsod nams de ni de bas khyad par 'phags/ /rnam thar de dag rab tu bstan pa'i tshe/ /
81a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur/ /bdud kyi gnas rnams mog mog byas gyur cing / /sgra rab phyung bas ngan song rab tu zhi/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng ge rnams/ /de dag kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te/ /phyag dzad nas yon tan
81a7(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa/ /bzang po dpal gyi mgo la bzhag par gyur/ /phyag gi mthil gyis mgo la byug mdzad de/ /rnam thar 'di dag legs par bshad pa legs/ /khyod kyis legs bstan rjes su nged dgyes zhes/ /sangs rgyas de dag kun gyis
81b1(mdo sde): gsung brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag 'khod pa'i lha thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de
81b2(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas 'di legs par bka' stsal to/ /kye ma de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa 'di mdzad do/ /chos bstan pa 'di sngon ma thos so/ /sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnyed par 'gyur ba
81b3(mdo sde): de dag ni shin tu dkon te/ /sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /sems can de dag ni lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la
81b4(mdo sde): mchod rten lta bur 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/ rab tu byung ba rnams sam/ khyim na gnas pa rnams sam/ de bzhin du rgyal po rnams sam/ blon po chen po rnams sam/ khyim bdag rnams kyis gtse bar mi nus so zhes
81b5(mdo sde): ca co dang gzha'i sgra phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mdo sde dkon mchog 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' ba lags te/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus chos 'di lta
81b6(mdo sde): bu ni 'jig rten du byung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu nyid kyis sems can de dag gis kyang thos lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig /chongs
81b7(mdo sde): shig / lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags te/ slan chad mi bsgyud par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
82a1(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa kun du bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / nyan thos
82a2(mdo sde): chen po gzhan dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
82a3(mdo sde): grangs rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/
82a4(mdo sde): Ar+ya bo d+hi sa twa go tsa ra u pA ya bi Sha ya bi kurba Na nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
82a5(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul 'phags rgyal na rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi skyed mos tshal shing sA la dang / ta la dang / ta ma la dang / dong ka'i shing dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang /
82a6(mdo sde): p+lag sha dang / u dum bA ra dang / bar shi shi ka dang / d+ha nu ka ri dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / skya snar gyis legs par brgyan pa/ 'bab chu'i dngo dang / mtsho dang / mtsho bran dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / lu ma
82a7(mdo sde): mang pos mdzes par byas pa/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar pos mngon par gang ba/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / khu byug dang / ku na la dang / 'dab skyob dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / shang
82b1(mdo sde): shang te'u dag sgra mngon par sgrogs pa dang ldan pa/ bung ba mang pos gang ba/ sa gzhi ne'u gsing sngo ba dang ldan pa'i nags tshal chen po mchog na/ dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
82b2(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / 'od srung chen po dang / ma 'gags pa dang / rab 'byor dang / kAt+yA'i bu chen po dang / ka pi na chen po dang / nag po dang / dga' bo dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung dang /
82b3(mdo sde): byams ma'i bu gang po dang / ba lang bdag dang / bka ku la dang / lam bstan dang / lam phran bstan dang / gyad bu nor dang / seng ldeng nags dang / skul byed dang / gsus po che dang / sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag
82b4(mdo sde): la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong dang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa/ ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa nam mkha' gnas med pa'i spyod yul ba/ mi rten par gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa dang /
82b5(mdo sde): sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa thams cad dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad tshul gcig pa la yang dag par gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par phyogs pa/ lam
