138a5(mdo sde): ldan zhes bya/ /yab ni tshangs pa'i dbyig ces bya bar 'gyur/ /de yi bu ni rnam grags sgra zhes bya/ /dper na nga'i bu sgra gcan zin 'di 'dra/ /bde gshegs de yi btsun mo dam pa ni/ /blo gros chen mo nga yi sa 'tsho bzhin/ /de yi ma ma ming ni grags chen te/ /nga yi skye
138a6(mdo sde): dgu'i bdag mo chen mo bzhin/ /thub pa'i rim gro byed pa'i sems can 'phags/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhes bya ba ste/ /nga yi rim gro 'dun pa gus ldan bzhin/ /de ni 'dren pa de la rim gro byed/ /thub pa de yi rta mchog 'gyur ba yi/ /shugs can zhes bya'i ming dang ldan
138a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ /bde gshegs mngon par 'byung tshe bcibs par 'gyur/ /nga yi rta mchog bsngags ldan gyur pa bzhin/ /bde gshegs de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing / /chos kyi 'phags zhes bya ba de tshe 'byung / /shing mchog brgya phrag stong du bsgyur ba yin/ /phrag ni brgyad cu
138b1(mdo sde): dag gis de bskor 'gyur/ /shing mchog de drung kye ma chos kyi rgyal/ /rang byung zla med bden zhes bya bzhugs nas/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub rab zhi ba/ /mya ngan med pa mngon par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /de na bdud med bdud kyi phyogs kyang med/ /bdud kyi las kyang der
138b2(mdo sde): 'byung mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba thub pa gang zag zla med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gnod bdo med par 'gyur/ /mi dang lha tshogs mang po 'du 'gyur te/ /rnam dag shin tu sbyangs pa de tshe 'byung / /de kun me tog phreng ba gos dang glu/ /rol mo sgra yis bde gshegs
138b3(mdo sde): drung 'dong 'gyur/ /rgyal bas de dag bsam mkhyen mdo sde 'di/ /mdo gzhan lhan cig drang srong gsung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba des ni rab tu gsungs pa yi/ /mdo sde khyad par 'phags pa 'di thos nas/ /sems can dpag yas gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /thub dbang
138b4(mdo sde): byang chub mchog tu mi ldog 'gyur/ /theg pa dman pa der 'byung mi 'gyur te/ /rang rgyal theg pa'ang zhing der 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rgyal ba de yi sangs rgyas zhing mchog der/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'byung kun dpa' zhing mdzangs/ /rkang gnyis mchog de'i 'dus pa
138b5(mdo sde): dang por ni/ /rgyal sras grags pa'i 'od ldan gang 'byung ba/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog /rnam dag gang gA'i rdul bas mang ba 'byung / /blo bzang ldan pa'i 'dus pa gnyis pa ni/ /skye ba gcig gnas khrag khrig brgyad cu 'byung / /'dus pa gsum
138b6(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems dpa' mchog / dkrigs phrag drug cu dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs de'i tshe yi tshad 'gyur ba/ /bskal pa bar ma drug cu tshang ba ste/ /rgyal ba de ni mya ngan 'das gyur nas/ /mi yi 'dren pa'i chos kyi sgron ma yang / /lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig
138b7(mdo sde): stong phrag ni/ /brgyad cu tham par gnas par 'gyur ba yin/ /rang gi sku gdung ring bsrel rgyas mdzad cing / /de ni gdul ba rab mang 'dul bar 'gyur/ /drang srong che de byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /tog chen lung bstan mdzad nas mya ngan 'da'/ /'di ni bkod chen zhes bya'i thub dbang
139a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /rgyal ba dgra las rgyal bar 'di 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba de yi zhing bkod 'di 'dra ste/ /'jig rten phan par mdzad pa 'di bzhin no/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub mnyam med dri med pa/ /rab zhi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon por 'gyur/ /nga yi mkhyen
139a2(mdo sde): pa de 'dra nam mkha'i tshad/ /bskal pa 'byung ba mang po rab tu shes/ /'das pa'i los shes da ltar ci zhig sems/ /ye shes kun du thogs pa med pa mnga'/ /nga yi tshig ni dag cing med de/ /du mi smra don dam bden pa la/ /nga gnas nas ni nam yang mi
139a3(mdo sde): smra'o/ /ji skad gsungs pa 'di la yid ches gyis/ /drang srong chen po'i gsung 'di thos gyur nas/ /'khor rnams kun kyang dga' ba'i sems gyur te/ /de tshe khams der skye bar shog shig ces/ /zhing mchog der skyer dad pas smon lam btab/ /'jig rten khams
139a4(mdo sde): mchog der ni skye 'gyur te/ /'jig rten 'dren pas de dag lung bstan te/ /der ni khyed kyis bde gshegs thob gyur nas/ /kun kyang sems can don mang byed par 'gyur/ /mdo sde rgyal po 'di bstan de yi tshe/ /sa chen 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /byang chub
139a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' pad mar gnas pa dag / de tshe thal sbyar thub la 'di skad gsol/ /khyod kyis chos tshul dam pa 'di gsungs pa/ /thub pa zla med rang bzhin shin tu legs/ /chos kyi tshul rab dam pa mnyan pa dang / /rgyal ba'i chos 'tshal bdag cag 'dir mchis lags/ /
139a6(mdo sde): de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs la rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas gos re re bzhag ste/ /gos gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas tshig 'di skad kyang smras te/ kye ma 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
139a7(mdo sde): ba gnyis pa byung bar gyur te/ dang po ni grong khyer bA rA Na sIr bskor to/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de ring 'dir bskor to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos rin po che 'di lta bu 'di dang mi 'bral zhing skyes bu dam pa 'di dang
139b1(mdo sde): mi 'bral bar shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i rnga chen po dag sgra mngon par 'byin par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po'i char chen po yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du
139b2(mdo sde): mngon par bab par gyur to/ /steng gi bar snang la yang lha rnams kyis lha'i gos dag g.yab mo'i thabs su bskor te/ /tshig 'di skad kyang brjod par gyur to/ /skyes bu dam pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de
139b3(mdo sde): dag ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog
139b4(mdo sde): pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang / glegs bam du bgyis shing 'chang ba na bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
139b5(mdo sde): gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes can
139b6(mdo sde): ma yin pa ji snyed pa dang sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod par sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la de dag
139b7(mdo sde): thams cad la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bskal par gnas pa'i tshe bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas/ bla mar byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod pa byas na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams
140a1(mdo sde): mang du skyed dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mang lags te/ 'di ltar bgrang ba'am/ brtsi bar yang sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bas kyang gang gis chos kyi rnam
140a2(mdo sde): grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston tam/ glegs bam du bris te 'chang ngam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung 'bogs pa de bsod nams mang du skyed do/ /de skad ces bka'
140a3(mdo sde): stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad la sman pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam
140a4(mdo sde): grangs 'di yun ring po ji srid cig tu 'dzam bu'i gling na mchis par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nga mya ngan las 'das nas gang gi tshe rgyal po brgyad kyis nga'i ring bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir brgyad du bgos nas za ma tog brgyad du bcug ste/
140a5(mdo sde): rang rang gi yul du mchod rten gyi khang pa yangs par 'jog par 'gyur te/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras ni nga'i ring bsrel rnams las brgyad cha blangs nas rin po che'i za ma tog tu bcug ste/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi rol tu sa brkos nas ring bsrel la pog snod kha gab
140a6(mdo sde): bcad nas spos kyis ni bdugs/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ni btsugs/ rin po che'i me tog ni gtor/ lo brgyar byin gyis brlabs pa'i mar me me lce gcig tu 'bar ba ni bus shing ring bsrel gyi za ma tog 'jog par 'gyur la/ rgyal po mya ngan med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba bsdad
140a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir mdo'i rgyal po 'di gser gyi glegs bam la bris nas ring bsrel gyi za ma tog de nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ rgyal po mya ngan med pa de ni mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni mo'u r+ya'i rigs su skyes pa/ 'dzam
140b1(mdo sde): bu'i gling la dbang ba/ mthu dang brtson pa thob pa/ stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ de nga'i rnam pa las rjes su dran par byed par 'gyur ro/ /nga'i bstan pa la yang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dbang po bde ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul
140b2(mdo sde): che ba/ mthu che ba/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/ rgyal po'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ rgyal po mya ngan med pas bkur ba grong du 'jug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de ltar rgyal po mya ngan med pa des nga'i ring
140b3(mdo sde): bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir skye bo mang pos yongs su bskor cing bkod pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu chen pos me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por song nas mchod
140b4(mdo sde): pa'i cho ga mngon par 'du bya ba chen po byas te sa'i phyogs de nas ring bsrel gyi za ma tog de phyung nas/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar du spos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / me tog phreng thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / sil snyan thams
140b5(mdo sde): cad dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs thams cad kyis mchod pa rnam pa du ma byas te/ skar ma dang / sbyor ba dang ldan pa gcig la yul sna tshogs su chos kyi rgyal pos byas pa'i mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe chos smra ba dbang po bde bas
140b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ring bsrel gyi za ma tog nas phyung nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud kyi yul chen por 'jog par 'gyur te/ skye bo mang pos shes par mi 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos rig par mi 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos yongs su bzung bar mi 'gyur la chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin pa nyung
140b7(mdo sde): ba dang / klog pa nyung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rtag tu sgrom du bcug pa dang snod du bcug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos tshol ba med cing snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mos par dka'
141a1(mdo sde): zhing yid ches par dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ba ste/ mun sprul du mngon par yid ches pa'am/ 'jug par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang la la dag gis thos
141a2(mdo sde): te/ yid ches par gyur tam/ tshol lam rtog na de dag ni 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ legs par spyod pa spyad pa/ theg pa chen po 'di'i snod du gyur par nges par rig par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag
141a3(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / glegs bam du byas shing 'chang ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang bdag cag gis ni sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mthong bar gyur to/ /mnyes par
141a4(mdo sde): byas so/ /bsnyen bkur byas so zhes bya ba dang / de dag gis ni nga yang skyed mos tshal 'di na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa 'di yang mthong ngo zhes de ltar shes par bya'o/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
141a5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long shig /zung shig /kun chub par gyis shig /dbang po rnon po rnams ma gtogs par gar bab bab kyi mdun du ma ston cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin pa dang / 'di ni
141a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar chad med pa'i chos bstan pa yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba bsgom pa yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
141a7(mdo sde): pa'i gter gyi mchog yin pa'i phyir te/ kun dga' bo de bas na nga'i bu thu bo chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ chos kyi mdzod srung ba de dag la sbyin par bya ba ma gtogs par 'di ni shin tu sba bar bya zhing su la'ang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi
141b1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par
141b2(mdo sde): 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar med pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul zhes bya ba dang / theg pa gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis
141b3(mdo sde): yongs su dris pa zhes bya ba dang / bden smra lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / bden smra'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig phrag sum cu sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyes pa las sems skyes par gyur to/ /byang
141b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' drug khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /sems can tshad med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang 'jam dpal gzhon
141b5(mdo sde): nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang /
141b6(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa
141b7(mdo sde): bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
142a1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ru NA ni ra de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
142a2(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri/ sngon rgyal ba bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs pa sa'i snying po/
142a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas mngon par bstod pa/ chos kyi gdan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gyis phyag byas pa'i sa phyogs/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skul ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba chos kyi sgo mngon par brjod pa/ byang chub sems
142a4(mdo sde): dpa' 'byung ba/ yon tan tshad med pa las yang dag par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/ slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i
142a5(mdo sde): tshogs ni mnga'/ chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa ni legs par mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba legs par 'joms pa la ni mkhas/
142a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun mi 'chad cing dge slong stong phrag drug cu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su
142a7(mdo sde): thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs par bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal
142b1(mdo sde): po'i sras/ chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i chos kyis nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go/ /byang chub sems
142b2(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang yang thabs cig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyis nges par byung ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sprin las lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / rnam par
142b3(mdo sde): grol ba'i glog phyung zhing bdud rtsi'i chu'i rgyun gyi char 'bebs pas 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad la sems sa dang mnyam pa rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sna tshogs kyi lo thog yang dag par 'phel bar byed
142b4(mdo sde): pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong bas gti mug gi mun pa sel ba'i lam gyi snang ba thob pa kun tu ston pa dang / sems can gyi pad ma kha 'byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sred pa'i chu skems pa dang / shes
142b5(mdo sde): pa'i las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jog pa la mngon par shes pa chen po dang / zhi gnas kyis rgyu ba/ zla ba lta bur 'gro ba thams cad la sems mnyam pas mngon par zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pas 'grib pa dang 'phel ba kun tu ston pa/ ri rab lta
142b6(mdo sde): bu'i lhag pa'i bsam pas tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rin po che shin tu brtan te/ ngos bzhi nas yul gyi rlung thams cad kyis mi sgul cing 'jig rten gyi chos las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu bstan pa snang bar gyur pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar gzungs dang dran pa'i snod
142b7(mdo sde): rgya chen po chos kyi chus yongs su gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rin po ches 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/ kyi rgyal po ltar bden pa'i rkang pa dang / byams pa rab tu 'phel ba'i mjug ma dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi mig dang ldan zhing chos zab
143a1(mdo sde): mo la skrag pa med pas pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med cing mtha' yas thug pa med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun ma bcad pas yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
143a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang zhing sgrib pa med par lta ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhing thams cad kyi rgyun bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung
143a3(mdo sde): ba'i spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod lam thams cad kyis 'dul ba mi 'khrugs pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs
143a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser bzang po rnam par bsags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rnam par nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
143a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pas brtan pas bsags pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang thabs cig go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'dug
143a6(mdo sde): pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu drug bzhes te/ tshangs par spyod pa rgyas par gyur par mkhyen/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po
143a7(mdo sde): de yang gzigs shing mkhyen te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas 'di snyam du gang gi phyir ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgya cher rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
143b1(mdo sde): chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gzud pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag
143b2(mdo sde): par bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
143b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi bar du 'khor gyi khyams/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas de bzhin
143b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsam pa tshim par byed pa/ lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ phyogs
143b5(mdo sde): bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par skul ba/ gzhi bai dUr+ya dkar po'i dbyibs dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi khang pa dag dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rta babs dag dang / rin po che rdo'i snying po'i sgo khang dag dang / nor bu rin po che snying po'i kha khyer dag dang / rin
143b6(mdo sde): po che dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi stegs bu dag dang / rin po che kun nas 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag dang / rin po che thams cad kyis dgab pa dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu spyangs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba dang / lha'i dar gyi lda ldi mngon par
143b7(mdo sde): spyangs pas bsngags pa bstan pa dpag tu med cing thug pa med pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byung ste/ 'khor gyi khyams de yang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos bskus pa/ tsan dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dri yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ dri'i
144a1(mdo sde): mchog a ga ru dam pa'i snying pos bdugs pa/ klu'i mu tig dang rin po che'i me tog gis rnam par spras pa/ me tog sil ma bkram pa/ rin po che'i shing dang / rin po che'i mkha' rten gyis mdzes par byas pa ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
144a2(mdo sde): na rgyan mdzes pa bkod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams de nyid na kun tu snang ngo / /der gdan seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ sna tshogs pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mtho ba/ rab tu bzang ba/ yangs pa/ rgya che ba/
144a3(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir them skas kha khyer mi bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyis bskor ba/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rin po che an da rnyil dang / mthon kha chen pos snying por gyur pa/ brgya
144a4(mdo sde): byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i gdugs can/ tshangs pa'i ne tso 'am ci dang / rin po che ser pos spras pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba kun tu bskyod pas sgra 'byung ba/ sa'i steng nas 'khor gyi khyams la thug gi bar du gyen du mngon par 'phags pa/ drang ba ma yo ba
144a5(mdo sde): bzhi stong byung bar gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang de lta bu'i them skas chen po dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs
144a6(mdo sde): shing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
144a7(mdo sde): dpa'i tshogs dang thabs cig / nyan thos kyi tshogs dang thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar te/ lha dang klus mngon par bstod cing me tog gi char chen po ni 'bebs/ na bza'i char chen pos ni mngon par 'gebs/
144b1(mdo sde): phye ma dang / /spos dang / byug pa'i char chen po ni 'thor/ sil snyan dang / sgra dbyangs chen po ni rab tu sgrogs/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa ni snang bar mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs
144b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen
144b3(mdo sde): pos bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag du ma zhabs 'bring du 'brang zhing nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi them skas kyi dbus nas
144b4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste
144b5(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ nyi zla me dang nor bu'i 'od dang lha yul pa yi lha 'od shin tu dri med pa/ /thub pas 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan nas ngan song gsum po dag kyang zhi bar mdzad/ /ri bo lhun po dang ni kho ra khor yug rtse mo
144b6(mdo sde): bsnyil te zhing rnams gsal bar gyur pas na/ /dga' zhing yid rnams mgu nas don rnams thams cad grub pa'i rgyal ba la ni skyabs su mchi/ /de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das
144b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom
145a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rdzu 'phrul dam pa brnyes shing rab tu mtshungs pa med pa rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu ston/ /rgyal ba nyi ma ji bzhin 'phags te zhing rnams bye ba brgya dag tu yang rab tu gda'/ /rgyal bas rang gi yon tan kun gyis zhing rnams
145a2(mdo sde): thams cad brgyan te shin tu mdzes mdzad pa/ /gang zhig shin tu mnyam med mtshungs pa med cing rdzu 'phrul dbang du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring
145a3(mdo sde): du 'brang ngo / /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i na bza'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
145a4(mdo sde): bstod pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyi mkhyen pa mtha' yas yangs pas sems can bsam pa mkhyen/ /mkha' 'dra'i lam gyi chos gsum dag la chags med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ /sems kyi 'jug pa gcig gis 'gro ba'i sems kyi spyod pa thams cad mkhyen/ /des
145a5(mdo sde): na srid pa gsum po dag na lus can rnams kyis mchod par 'os/ /de nas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs
145a6(mdo sde): pa dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ gang gi slad du sgra dang yi ge ma mchis gang du'ang rgyu ba
145a7(mdo sde): ma mchis pas/ /khyod kyis chos rnams mi g.yo ya ma brla dang sgyu ma smig rgyu 'drar mkhyen nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes sems can rnams la ched du chos mchog gsungs pas na/ /chos kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin mkhas pa bdag med gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
145b1(mdo sde): de nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo / /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par
145b2(mdo sde): rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/ /chos kyi zong gis rang gi stobs bcu mkha' 'dra 'od zer ldan pa dang / /thugs rje brnyes
145b3(mdo sde): nas byams pa'i dgongs pas sems can rnams la gzugs ston pa/ /gru tshul chos la gnyis su med par zhugs kyang rgyal ba mtshungs par mkhyen/ /chos kyi khyad par sems lhag don kun grub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
145b4(mdo sde): la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs pa dang / 'khor gyi khyams su mngon par phyogs par
145b5(mdo sde): rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mu tig gi do shal gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /tshul khrims dri ma mi mnga' rnam dag rnam par nges pa dam pa ting nge 'dzin mchog mi
145b6(mdo sde): g.yos pa/ /mnyam med blo ldan rgya mtsho 'dra bar gnas shing srid las rnam grol dbang sgyur zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rim gyis byams dang ldan pa'i thugs rje yis ni bden pa'i lam gyi rnam pa rab tu gnas mdzad pa/ /rnam thar gsum gyi lam gyi khyams na gnas pa'i bde
145b7(mdo sde): gshegs seng ge khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje'i chu bo ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam 'phel ba/ /zhi gnas 'dab ma rnam par grol ba'i me tog rgyas/ /slob ma'i tshogs kyi bung bas nges par bsnyen gyur pa/ /bde gshegs pad ma la ni spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnga'
146a1(mdo sde): bdag g.yo ba ma mchis tshul khrims sar gnas pas/ /brtson 'grus mtshungs pa ma mchis stobs kyis yang dag 'phags/ /yul gyi rlung rnams langs pa chen pos mi g.yos pa/ /sangs rgyas ri bo dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnga' bdag thugs rjes
146a2(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa/ /blo gter blo mchog gis ni rab tu 'joms mdzad pa/ /sems can brgya dag gis ni mang pos mchod gyur pa/ /bde gshegs zla ba khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa'i lam gshegs pa/ /shes
146a3(mdo sde): rab 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas 'gengs shing / /skye bo mang po mtshungs med pad ma kha 'byed pa/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnga' bdag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na yang / /'dren pa khyod dang mnyam pa dmigs par ma gyur te/ /khyod
146a4(mdo sde): ni yon tan kun gyis yang dag grub pa lags/ /bdag cag khyod la bstod pas ngoms par 'gyur ma lags/ /lha dbang klu dang lha ma yin gyis phyag bgyis pa/ /lha mchog brgya dag gis kyang yang dag mngon bstod pa/ /bsngags pa brgya phrag mang pos yang dag mngon bstod pa/ /
146a5(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa bstod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi
146a6(mdo sde): yul rnam par sprul pa tshad med pa lha 'bum gyis mngon par bstod nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir them skas nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs pa shes pa de
146a7(mdo sde): bzhin du/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gshegs par shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams stong gsum gyis yongs su gzung ba rin po che bkod par gdan seng ge'i khri ji ltar bshams pa
146b1(mdo sde): la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po dag kyang stan ci rigs pa la 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom
146b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byung ste/ byung
146b3(mdo sde): nas kyang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs rnams dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang
146b4(mdo sde): bar byas ma thag tu/ de nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyun chad do/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang rgyun chad
146b5(mdo sde): do/ /sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 'dod chags kyis gnod par ma gyur cing / zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis kyang gnod par ma gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / pha ma lta bu'i
146b6(mdo sde): 'du shes su gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / /gang gis brtson 'grus stobs ni mtha' yas yangs pa brtan pa brtsams gyur te/ /gang gis brtson
146b7(mdo sde): 'grus chen po'i stobs kyis bskal pa dag las phyir phyogs spangs/ /gang gis yon tan dag ni phyogs bcu rnams na mthu ldan rab brjod pa/ /shAkya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa mdzes/ /gang chos rgya chen bla med mnyan slad de yi zhabs la phyag
147a1(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ /mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa dag ni bskal pa grangs med rtag tu nyan/ /blo rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa tshim skyed pa/ /thub pa des ni gang phyir sems can bde bar bzhed pas 'od 'di phyung / /mnga'
147a2(mdo sde): bdag gang zhig brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud stobs mu stegs tshogs bcas pham mdzad nas/ /pad+ma byung ba bzhin du 'phags shing phyogs bcu dag tu lhun po ji bzhin mdzes/ /gang zhig nyi ma bzhin du sku yi 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa/ /de yi chos kyi 'khor
147a3(mdo sde): lo gzhag pa don chen gsan du rgyal ba gshegs su gsol/ /rab tu bskor bar ma gyur mtshungs pa med cing rgyal ba kun gyis bskor gyur pa/ /'khor lo dam pa stobs bcu sems can thugs brtse phyir ni de ring skor bar mdzad/ /srog chags rnams kyis bsten par rnyed
147a4(mdo sde): dka' legs pa rgya chen de ring 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang dag dad pa dang ba che yangs don du gnyer ba de dag de ring ltos/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis go bar byas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par
147a5(mdo sde): bskul/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas/ sems can thams cad bde bar byas/ nyon mongs pa'i khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad mog mog por byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag
147a6(mdo sde): tu med pa dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam dag rin chen 'od byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i chos rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'od zer bkod
147a7(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i bsod nams bkod pas rgya che ba dang ldan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems
147b1(mdo sde): dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi
147b2(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i nor bu bai dUr+ya'i dra ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod
147b3(mdo sde): do/ /bcom ldan rab tu mtshungs med yon tan pha rol phyin/ /khyod kyi yon tan bsngags phreng phyogs bcu kun na brjod/ /khyod kyi yon tan tshogs mchis zhing gang yon tan gter/ /der ni chos don gnyer ba bdag cag rab tu mchi/ /chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam rtog ma mchis ji
147b4(mdo sde): bzhin du/ /bcom ldan dri med 'od kyis mnyam pa nyid mkhyen kyang / /shin tu bslab pa'i sgyu ma mkhan ltar chos kyi rgyal/ /sems can rnam par dgrol slad tha dad bstan pa mdzad/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis
147b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ shar phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten
147b6(mdo sde): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur
147b7(mdo sde): nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan
148a1(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing gser gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan thugs rje'i sprin gyis 'jig rten rgyas bkang nas/ /'od kyi glog phyung
148a2(mdo sde): stong pa bdag med sgra bsgrags te/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi chu yis zhi mdzad cing / /dkar po'i stobs dbang nags tshal gel pa 'phel bar mdzad/ /bde gshegs shes rab 'od kyis gti mug mun bsal nas/ /ring nas srid mtshor gnyid log sems can sad mdzad
148a3(mdo sde): de/ /lam yang bstan cing sred pa dag kyang skams par mdzad/ /thar pa'i grong gnas rnams kyi mig kyang rnam par sbyong / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas lho phyogs
148a4(mdo sde): logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi
148a5(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor
148a6(mdo sde): gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu mu tig gi do shal gyi phreng ba'i dra bas bcom
148a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /khyod kyi sku yi 'phrin las nam mkha'i khams 'dra zhing / /smon lam dge bas dag pa bye ba phrag mang ldan/ /dri med rnam par dag cing zag pa med pa des/ /
148b1(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal/ /khyod kyi tshig ni rgyun chags gsal zhing mtshungs pa ste/ /'gro ba bsam dag bsam pa mnyam nyid yongs tshim bgyid/ /sems kyi rgyu dang rnam rtog gang yang mi mnga' yang / /sems can bsam pa rnams
148b2(mdo sde): la rgyal ba dag gi 'byung / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas nub phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod
148b3(mdo sde): do/ /de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa na byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
148b4(mdo sde): gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
148b5(mdo sde): sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu'i do shal dang rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su
148b6(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /'dzam bu'i chu gser btso ma lta bur ser ba'i sku/ /kun nas spyan mnga' phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes/ /mtshungs med sku la sems can gang dag nges rtog pa/ /de dag skyon med bde zhing dga' ba
148b7(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis lhun po brtsegs pa lta bu'i khrun tsam du/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa mtshungs med rgyal ba bltas kyang ni/ /de yi rdzu 'phrul kun gyi stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi/ /rnam par sprul pas rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug mthong mi nus/ /de nas byang chub sems

149a6(mdo sde): 'byam ston mdzad de/ /kun tu bstan kyang rnam par 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis/ /bsam pa chen po dag ldan ci 'drar gyur de la/ /dpag med rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pas de ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa

149b1(mdo sde): can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mig bzang po na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar

149b4(mdo sde): dam pa g.yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du/ /tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung / /tshul khrims med gzigs mgon po shin tu thugs rje zhing / /bdag la bstod pa mi mdzad gzhan la smod mi mdzad/ /lhun po ji bzhin khyod brtan bla ma rgya chen sten/ /chu
149b5(mdo sde): gter zab mo bzhin du shin tu gting dpag dka'/ /srid pa thog mar bcings pa kun nas grol ba ste/ /sems can khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis

149b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang bral ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi

150a3(mdo sde): bu dngos po med par ston/ /sgyu ma lta bu sems can khams ni 'dul mdzad kyang / /'di na sems can rang bzhin ma mchis khams ma mchis/ /dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/ /gzugs mthong yang dag 'du shes de bzhin mthong ma lags/ /'dus byas
150a4(mdo sde): dngos po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra bar gsung / /chos rnam snang yang 'di na chos la chags ma mchis/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub dang byang gi mtshams phyogs

150b2(mdo sde): kyis chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma med par mkhyen/ /khyod kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal/ /mtha' yas blo mnga' sems kyi bsam pa cho ga mkhyen/ /sems can gcig gi spyod bzhin sems can kun gyi spyod/ /gang dag dus gsum ldan pa de dag
150b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis mkhyen/ /sems can 'du shes mi 'jug sems kyi 'du shes mun/ /'du shes yongs shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par

150b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu rin po che'i gling gi phreng gi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /gal te khrag khrig zhing na ji snyed rdul mchis pa/ /de snyed bde
151a1(mdo sde): gshegs sras po rgyal ba'i drung lhags te/ /bskal pa bye ba stong mang zhu ba zhus pa dag /de dag thams cad tshig gcig dus kyis go bar mdzad/ /blo la mkhas pa rab rdzogs shes rab shin tu rdzogs/ /gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod

151a7(mdo sde): bla med rnams kyi gsung thugs spyod yul mtha' yas pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas mkhyen gyi sems can gzhan gyis min/ /dper na nam mkha'i mtha' ma skye bos mi rnyed bzhin/ /mtshungs med spyod pa mtha' dbung med pa ji bzhin du/ /byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin 'on te mya
151b1(mdo sde): ngan 'das/ /sa bon ji bzhin de ltar 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar/ /de bzhin phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i gnas kyang tshad ma mchis/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas steng
151b2(mdo sde): gi bar snang la dong ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag 'od des bskul ma thag tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la

151b4(mdo sde): ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing snod du gyur pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / mi
151b5(mdo sde): dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung bsal ba'i sgra de thos nas lus dang / sems tshim par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i them skas dag nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan
151b6(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu ji ltar 'thun pa'i stan dag la 'khod do/ /gsung bsal ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chen dang /
151b7(mdo sde): 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang
152a1(mdo sde): dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang bskul nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan rab tu brtan pa dag la 'khod
152a2(mdo sde): do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po de 'dus par mkhyen nas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas byang chub sems dpa'i stobs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba
152a3(mdo sde): byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'od des reg ma thag tu/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan
152a4(mdo sde): thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor gyi khyams rin
152a5(mdo sde): po che bkod pa'i dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri 'phang du shing ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu tsam du mtho ba/ rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ kha khyer rgyan thams cad las byas pa/ ras bkod pa thams cad bting ba/ me tog sil ma
152a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bla re yid du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ 'khor thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ bsam pa tshim par
152a7(mdo sde): byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri chen po bskul bar bsngags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba mngon par sprul nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de
152b1(mdo sde): las langs te/ gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu bgyid/ /lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum cu rtsa gsum dga'/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs
152b2(mdo sde): kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas mthu yi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/ /chos rnams mi g.yo nam mkha'i rang bzhin ya ma brla/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chu yi zla 'dra zhing / /rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par/ /mkhyen nas mgon
152b3(mdo sde): po 'dir ni rnam par sgrub pa ston/ /bkod pa'i sems kyi dbang 'gro sems ni gzugs can min/ /rnam sgrub thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro/ /bkod pa thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dra/ /rnam sgrub bdag gis ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma
152b4(mdo sde): mchis/ /gang gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba/ /de la glo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so/ /rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems grol ba/ /de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston/ /sa steng rdul tsam mngon
152b5(mdo sde): par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang / /sa steng nor bu rin chen sna tshogs kun tu bstan/ /gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bye ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ /khyod kyi seng ge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchog dang dar gyi phreng ba bsgreng / /de
152b6(mdo sde): ni gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'ong ma mchis/ /khyod kyis gang nas chos rnams 'du ba mkhyen nas kyang / /sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs ston/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan legs shing shin tu bsrungs pa'i gsung / /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa
152b7(mdo sde): bsod nams gzi brjid mang / /bdag la thugs brtse'i slad du 'dzegs te gdan la bzhugs/ /rga dang 'chi dang na ba gcod pa'i chos bshad gsol/ /khyod la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang chos ni mnyan slad du/ /rnam dag sems can 'di rnams phyogs bcu dag nas
153a1(mdo sde): lhags/ /gang gi don du lhags pa'i don de stsal du gsol/ /seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i lhag pa'i
153a2(mdo sde): bsam pa mkhyen nas gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa brnyes nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems
153a3(mdo sde): dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa/ so so yang
153a4(mdo sde): dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la dbab pa la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor la mi skye ba'i chos ston pa/ theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang
153a5(mdo sde): dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po la 'jug pa/ ston pa snying po dang ldan pa/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms
153a6(mdo sde): par byed pa/ tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul la gzhol bar 'jug pa/ nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ thub pa med par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs dang ye shes ston pa/ sangs
153a7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ chags pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgor 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par nges pa ston pa/ rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/ bsod nams
153b1(mdo sde): dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos
153b2(mdo sde): pa dang / shes rab zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang / ngag dang / sems rab tu dben par shes pa/ theg pa chen pos
153b3(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang /
153b4(mdo sde): bsnyad pa dang / bshad pa dang / bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor
153b5(mdo sde): gyi the tshom thams cad gcad pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de la
153b6(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ / //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
153b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags stobs kyi rgyal pos pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su
154a1(mdo sde): me tog gi lda ldi dag dang / me tog gi skon bu rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ me tog gi lda ldi dang / me tog gi skon bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par 'thor ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi
154a2(mdo sde): mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi spu'i khung bu thams cad du tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i drir byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub
154a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyis 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems
154a4(mdo sde): pas mig mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing mig mi 'dzums par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha'
154a5(mdo sde): yas dri med kyis chos la mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang mos par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i
154a6(mdo sde): rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i
154a7(mdo sde): rgyal pos brjed pa med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems dran zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub
154b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang ba zhes bya bas zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang / phyir rgol ba bcom par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub
154b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la
154b3(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te myur ba myur bar thabs su rang rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi snang
154b4(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i mchod pa rnam pa brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas gus pa dang
154b5(mdo sde): bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems
154b6(mdo sde): dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la mig gis mi rtsol bar 'gyur ba'i las mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dbugs dbyung ba stsol cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
154b7(mdo sde): thad du mchis te/ bdag cag chos nyan par bgyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po dag legs so legs so/ /gang gi phyir khyed bdud kyi las kyang 'or la de bzhin gshegs pa la
155a1(mdo sde): chos bshad par gsol ba yang thob shig dang / de nyid khyed kyi bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper
155a2(mdo sde): na mun pa mun nag lo du mar bsags pa ni mar me gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag bskal pa brgyar bsags pa yang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag 'di lta ste/
155a3(mdo sde): dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nor bu rin po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to/ /grogs po dag de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag
155a4(mdo sde): thams cad sel to/ /grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rim gyis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid
155a5(mdo sde): du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kun tu bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /deng ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
155a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed par the tshom ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus pa
155a7(mdo sde): 'di ni che ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa/ phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa sems shin tu byang bar bgyis te dri ma ma mchis par rig pa dang / rnam
155b1(mdo sde): par grol bas snang bar gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/ chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa/ thabs la mkhas pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/ bdud kyi las
155b2(mdo sde): dang rtsod pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa ma mchis pa'i
155b3(mdo sde): pha rol tu son pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / mos pa dang / gzungs dang / ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byin gyi rlabs thogs pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ /sems can thams cad kyi dbang pos mchog
155b4(mdo sde): dang / mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ 'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skad la mkhas pa/ mi 'am ci dang /
155b5(mdo sde): bya ka la ping ka dang / khrung khrung gi sgra dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs can/ shin tu bshes gnyen bgyis pas sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ brtan
155b6(mdo sde): zhing shin tu gnas la mi g.yo zhing ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgreng bar bgyid pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa'i khor yug lta bu/ smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
155b7(mdo sde): ba zab mo blta dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba la zhugs pa/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyi ga dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag bcad pa/ tshogs can chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gugs
156a1(mdo sde): pa/ ded dpon chen po bskal pa grangs med par chos dkon mchog gis bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i nad gso bar bgyid pa/ seng ge'i
156a2(mdo sde): sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ snrel zhi'i rgyud dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mi skrag pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa/ thams cad la
156a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' ba/ bdud bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa'i g.yul 'dul ba/ mnyan pa lta bur gyur pa/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa/ shin tu
156a4(mdo sde): yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa/ ri lta bur gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / smad pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal
156a5(mdo sde): las log pa/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs pa/ chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par bgyid pa/ pad+ma lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa/ 'od
156a6(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'od mog mog por bgyid pa/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ chos dkon mchog thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi
156a7(mdo sde): gdung mi gcod pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / 'dul ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang yang dag par ldan pa/ bsod nams
156b1(mdo sde): tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par bsngags pa mthar mi phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyi 'dus pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de la bdag
156b2(mdo sde): 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed pa snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni
156b3(mdo sde): phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba/ sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skyed pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ spyod pa
156b4(mdo sde): la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul gcig la 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba/ nges
156b5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa/ ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams lam la 'dzud pa/ theg pa gsum la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste ngo
156b6(mdo sde): mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig
156b7(mdo sde): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi khyams 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang ston pa'i rngo
157a1(mdo sde): mi thogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re ba skyed pa'i sems can shes rab
157a2(mdo sde): 'chal pa can de dag ni ngo mtshar che ba snyam bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper
157a3(mdo sde): na shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya bor nas nor bu mching bu la dmigs pa snyam du sems pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs par bgyi ba
157a4(mdo sde): snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni 'dra ba nyid du bdag la gda'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams
157a5(mdo sde): cad ni ring por mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cus bla na
157a6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus pa'i le'u'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas/ e ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus
157a7(mdo sde): pa 'di dag ni chos don du gnyer ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bshad pa'i phyir/ mi 'jigs pas spobs pa
157b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i 'od zer skyes bu chen po'i mtshan spyi gtsug nas byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de phyung ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
157b2(mdo sde): po'i lus la lan brgyar bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i spyi gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/ /'od des byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la reg ma thag tu/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang
157b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang / seng ge'i khri dang / lus brgya 'gyur du zil gyis mnan nas lam me/ lhang nge / lhan ne'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs
157b4(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rig nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan
157b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yu ba ni bai dUr+ya/ g.yogs ma ni gser/ snying po ni rin po che ne tsho 'am ci/ rtsibs ni an da rnyil las byas pa/ mu tig gi do shal rab
157b6(mdo sde): tu spyangs pa/ dar gyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba 'khrol ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis bzung ba/ rgyar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byin gyis brlabs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
157b7(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs de lta bu byin gyis brlabs nas me tog gi char yang phab ste/ sil snyan dang / sgra dbyangs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
158a1(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ /kun du snang ba kun nas 'od zer can/ /don rnams ma lus ston pa kun nas spyan/ /rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun dang ldan/ /skyes bu khyu mchog gis ni 'od zer phyung / /zhal
158a2(mdo sde): yang rnam par sbyong zhing 'od mdzad pa/ /'dren pa de ni bdag gi lus la yang / /lan brgyar bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor zhi/ /mi yi 'dren pa'i 'od kyis reg pas na/ /gang dag bdag gis sngon thob dran pa dang / /blo gros spobs pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs/ /rnam
158a3(mdo sde): pa stong du khyad par 'phags par gyur/ /bdag lus rab sim sems ni rnam par dag /bdag gi blo gros dga' mgu mnyam par gyur/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang / /spobs pa bdag gi lus la rab tu zhugs/ /sangs rgyas mthu chen bsnyen
158a4(mdo sde): par dka' ba la/ /nyam chung dag gis mnyes par bgyid mi nus/ /sangs rgyas gnang nas 'gro kun phan slad du/ /sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhu bar 'tshal/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 'jug dang / /'jig rten rnam 'dren dag gi 'byung ba dang / /snang
158a5(mdo sde): dang nges 'byung rnam par sprul pa dang / /dbang bskur ye shes yongs su zhu bar 'tshal/ /theg mchog dam pa rtogs par khong chud cing / /mtha' yas rgya che ba yi 'khor lhags dang / /gang dag rgya chen chos don gnyer ba dag /de dag phan slad sangs rgyas la yang
158a6(mdo sde): zhu/ /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu tshar gcad cing / /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di ni shin tu gzung / /bcom ldan phung po ma mchis dam chos mdzod/ /lus can rnams la bshad pa'i dus 'di lags/ /skyes bu khyu mchog mkhyen pa mtha' yas pas/ /
158a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan de la bdag gi blo mi chud/ /bde gshegs mkhyen pa shes pas mi dpogs pas/ /mkhas pa yangs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'tshal/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen 'jug dang / /ji ltar yun ring nas ni bslabs pa dang / /chos kyi dbang phyug
158b1(mdo sde): rgyal po rab bslabs pa/ /'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bshad du gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
158b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ni tshad ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston pa lags par rig cing / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can
158b3(mdo sde): thams cad mi gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par mthong nas don 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan dag ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis brgyan na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
158b4(mdo sde): spyod pa na mdzes pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas gti mug gi mun pa dang bral zhing the tshom ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi sgo chen po shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan
158b5(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas pa mchog dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
158b6(mdo sde): dag byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang / legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang / las kyi mtha' gdung ba ma mchis pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tshom dang
158b7(mdo sde): bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dag
159a1(mdo sde): yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams
159a2(mdo sde): cad la dbang sgyur ba 'thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas blo shin tu rnam par nges pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas mngon par 'phags pa'i chos kyi sgo de legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
159a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa la rnam par nges pa thob nas/ khyod blo rnam par nges pa 'di lta bus de bzhin
159a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so/ /de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon
159a5(mdo sde): tan tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom
159a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan dang / shes
159a7(mdo sde): rab kyi rgyan dang / gzungs kyi rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan
159b1(mdo sde): ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la gnod pa mi byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang ba'i sems med pa ni sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
159b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi rgyan gcig go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngan 'gro'i sgo gcod pa dang / bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang
159b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus rnam par dag pa dang / ngag rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
159b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang 'dod pa de 'byor pa dang / gang smon pa de yang dag par 'grub pa dang / gang 'dod pa de 'thob pa dang / gang rtsom pa de nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/ bzhi po
159b5(mdo sde): 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgyu med pa yin/ shes rab sgyu med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba sgyu med pa yin/
159b6(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgyu med pa yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bla na med pa sgyu med pa yin te lnga po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
159b7(mdo sde): yid la chags pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dren ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir 'dres pa ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i
160a1(mdo sde): chos shin tu rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir sra sre ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / gang gis 'dod par 'gro ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir rang dga'i tshul khrims dang / gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i shes pas rang gi dbang sgyur ba'i tshul khrims te drug po 'di dag
160a2(mdo sde): go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang /
160a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / thabs rnam par dag pa dang / bag yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad
160a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par 'phro ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhod pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas
160a5(mdo sde): 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byed pa phun sum tshogs pa ste brgyad po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/
160a6(mdo sde): dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jigs pa med pa yin/ skrag pa med pa yin/ bsam pa nges pa yin/ nye bar zhi ba yin/ bsil ba yin/ bcings pa lhod pa yin/ sems las su rung ba yin/ sems cang shes pa yin/ dul ba'i sa rjes su
160a7(mdo sde): 'thob pa yin te/ dgu po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir lus kyi rgyan dang / ji skad smras pa de
160b1(mdo sde): bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag gi rgyan dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyan dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir zhing gi rgyan dang / bsam pa yongs su spyod pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgyan dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i
160b2(mdo sde): phyir skye ba'i rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan dang / nga rgyal med pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / tshul khrims kyi
