160b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba la gnas pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan no/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
160b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa ste 'di ni gcig go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge
160b5(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang / mnyen pa ste gnyis po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu med
160b6(mdo sde): pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / bcos ma med pa ste gsum po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang
160b7(mdo sde): gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste bzhi po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/
161a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa lnga spong ba ste/ lnga po de dag gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tshom ste/ sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag spong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang
161a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa
161a3(mdo sde): dang / lha rjes su dran pa ste drug po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa ste/ dran pa
161a4(mdo sde): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge
161a5(mdo sde): 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam
161a6(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang
161a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te brgyad po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjed pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po'i gnas la gnas
161b1(mdo sde): te/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas nas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs
161b2(mdo sde): par byas te gnas so/ /de rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas
161b3(mdo sde): so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i
161b4(mdo sde): bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs
161b5(mdo sde): su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam
161b6(mdo sde): mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas
161b7(mdo sde): skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i
162a1(mdo sde): skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i
162a2(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi byed la/ sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang dag par gnas/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go/ /
162a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pas nges par sems pa dang / zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / nang du
162a4(mdo sde): yang dag 'jog sbed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba dang / sems dben pa dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / chos rnams la sems shing 'jal la so sor rtog pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs rab tu thob pa ste/ rigs
162a5(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
162a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad la the tshom med pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'gyod pa dang bral ba dang / kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba ste/ gnyis po 'di
162a7(mdo sde): dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gti mug spong ba dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs nges par gcog pa dang / mun pa mun nag sel ba ste/ gsum po 'di dag
162b1(mdo sde): go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang ba'i snang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon gsal
162b2(mdo sde): dang / lam bsgom pa'i byin gyi rlabs te/ bzhi po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa med pas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / shes
162b3(mdo sde): rab mchog gis bsam gtan pa yin pas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / gnyis dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang /
162b4(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid pas chos kyi phung po yongs su dag pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa'i
162b5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / rmi lam dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pas byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs
162b6(mdo sde): su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / brag ca lta bu'i shes pas ngag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o/ /'khor gsum
162b7(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyes par smras pa'i tshig rnams la khong khro ba spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / bstod pa dang / bsngags pa dang / rjes su chags pa spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa dag la chos kyi sku la
163a1(mdo sde): rab tu rtog pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur mos pas yongs su mi skyo ba yongs su dag pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i bsam pas brtan pa yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan
163a2(mdo sde): ma thams cad las sgrol bas blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gyur bar shes pas de la ma chags pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par zhen pa med pas lhag mthong
163a3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa skyed pas dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su
163a4(mdo sde): 'dzin pas gzungs yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan gyi phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran
163a5(mdo sde): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis lus dang sems dben pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang po yongs su
163a6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / stobs rnams kyis bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / lam rnams la 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med par shes pa ste bdun po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu
163a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu zhi ba'i phyir zhi gnas shes pa dang / rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag mthong shes pa dang / chos kyi phung po rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir phung po shes
163b1(mdo sde): pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir khams shes pa dang / grong stong dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye mched shes pa dang / bdag med pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa shes pa dang / yang
163b2(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu rtogs pas chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' dag pas 'das pa shes pa dang
163b3(mdo sde): phyi ma'i mtha' dag pas ma 'ongs pa shes pa dang / bar gyi mtha' dag pas da ltar byung ba shes pa dang / rgyu chud mi za bas nges pa rnams shes pa dang / rkyen phye bar sgrub pas ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pas log pa nyid du ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang /
163b4(mdo sde): chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'phags pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ dgu po
163b5(mdo sde): 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir rmi lam lta bur shes pa dang /
163b6(mdo sde): rnam par 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir smig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang / 'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pa dang / 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor lta bur shes pa dang / rkyen gyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir brag ca lta bur shes pa
163b7(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus byas dag 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/
164a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gcig ste
164a2(mdo sde): gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa brjed pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa ste/ gnyis
164a3(mdo sde): po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la mkhas pa dang / tshig 'bru la mkhas pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go/ /
164a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i tshig dang / rtsub pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang / pa med pa'i tshig ste/ bzhi po
164a5(mdo sde): 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa thams cad kyi nang nas don la rton pa dang / yi ge'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang nas ye shes la rton pa dang / mdo sde
164a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nang nas nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa dang / gang zag gi sgra thams cad las chos nyid la rton pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'jig rten las 'das pa la rton pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
164a7(mdo sde): gzungs kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bden pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i tshig rab tu thob pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / g.yo med pas blang bar 'os pa'i
164b1(mdo sde): tshig dang / snying rje chen po la sbyor bas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang / snod la mkhas pas phyad par chos ston pa dang / 'jig rten shes pas dus su chos ston pa ste drug po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi
164b2(mdo sde): rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mgyogs pa'i spobs pa dang / shugs can gyi spobs pa dang / myur ba'i spobs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med
164b3(mdo sde): pa'i spobs pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i skad shes pa dang / klu'i skad shes pa
164b4(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin gyi skad shes pa dang / dri za'i skad shes pa dang / lha ma yin gyi skad shes pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi skad shes pa dang / mi 'am ci'i skad shes pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa nas sems can thams cad kyi bar gyi skad
164b5(mdo sde): shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gyi nang du spa gong ba med pa dang / smra ba'i nang du zhum pa med pa dang / chos bshad pa'i
164b6(mdo sde): nang du 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'dri ba rnams la nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la snrel zhir bstan pa shes pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rjes su 'thun pa bstan pa shes pa dang / khengs pa dag la lag na
164b7(mdo sde): rdo rje ston pa dang / mngon par chags pa rnams la sreg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang / yongs su smin pa rnams la theg pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di
165a1(mdo sde): dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dogs pa thams cad la the tshom med par ston pa shes pa dang / blos chos skye ba'i sgo dang / shes rab kyi snang ba gzhan la lhag ma ma lus pa dang / yi ge bstan pa mi zad pa dang / don bstan pa rgyun chad pa med pa
165a2(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par rab tu brjod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med bar brjod pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bsngags pa tshad med pa ston pa dang / dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa chags
165a3(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir tshigs
165a4(mdo sde): su bcad ba 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang gis theg mchog dam pa 'di mdzes pa/ /blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste/ tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog /shin tu rnam nges don dang de bzhin gzungs/ /de ni lus can kun gyi yid
165a5(mdo sde): 'od dga'/ /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid dag cing / de yi rnam par lhung ba kun chad pa/ /'di ni tshul khrims ldan pa'i rgyan yin no/ /lha mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa skye/ /de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub/ /nan tan snying por byed
165a6(mdo sde): dang yang dag ldan/ /'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yin no/ /de yi ting 'dzin sgyu ma ma yin te/ /shes rab rnam grol de bzhin ye shes mthong / de yi mya ngan las 'das pa sgyu ma min/ /'di ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyan/ /tshul khrims
165a7(mdo sde): skyon med tshul khrims rnam par dag / tshul khrims sra sre ma yin 'dren ma med/ /de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin/ /'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur/ /bzod pa dag cing de bzhin
165b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dag / bsam gtan dag cing de bzhin shes rab dag /thabs dang de bzhin bag yod dag pa yin/ /g.yo ba med cing brtan la shin tu gnas/ /sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor rnam 'phro med/ /lhod pa spangs shing dgang sla gso yang sla/ /
165b2(mdo sde): 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /brtson 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa ste/ /de yi sems ni nam yang gdung mi 'gyur/ /de la yid la gcags par 'gyur med de/ /'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /'jigs pa
165b3(mdo sde): med cing mi skrag mi zhum ste/ /bsam pa des shing zhi la yid rab zhi/ /'dir ni de yi bcings pa lhod par gyur/ /'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /grags chen sems ni las su rung ba yin/ /de ni dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid/ /'dir ni
165b4(mdo sde): rang lus mtshan gyis brgyan byed pa/ /'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /mkhas pa de ni ngag gi rgyan thob ste/ /de ni nyon mongs med pas rtag sems brgyan/ /'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan/ /khyad
165b5(mdo sde): par 'phags pa'i zhing ni legs par brgyan/ /theg pa mchog la sems can yongs smin byed/ /gang phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas/ /rang gi skye ba legs par brgyan par byed/ /byang chub spyod pa rtag tu brgyan byed cing / /byang chub snying po dam pa brgyan
165b6(mdo sde): par byed/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag brgyan byed cing / /nga rgyal med pas shes pa legs par brgyan/ /de ni byams pas sems can kun khyab byed/ /mkhas pa rtag tu drang dang mnyen pa yin/ /g.yo ni med cing sgyu med bcos pa med/ /gti mug
165b7(mdo sde): 'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro ma yin/ /de ni sgrib pa lnga po rnam par sel/ /bag yod gyur nas rjes su dran drug bsgom/ /byang chub yan lag bdun dang lam sgom ste/ /mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin bsam gtan byed/ /rnal 'byor pa ni zhi gnas nges
166a1(mdo sde): sems sbyor/ /de ni tshul bzhin dge ba chud mi gson/ /dben dang shin tu sbyangs dang so sor rtog /'phags pa'i rigs la dbang ni sgyur ba yin/ /chos rnams la ni the tshom med par gyur/ /de la kun nas ldang dang 'gyod pa med/ /de
166a2(mdo sde): la ma rig gti mug mun pa med/ /bden pa snang ba yongs su shes pa shes/ /tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste/ /shes rab dam pa bsam gtan ting 'dzin dag /gnyis bsal nas ni rnam par grol ba dag /lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing shes pa
166a3(mdo sde): dag / dus gsum dag la ye shes mthong mi chags/ /'dod chags bral ba'i shes pas chos kyang dag /dag nas 'dir ni de la rlom sems med/ /'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan/ /shes rab kyis ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te/ /rmi lam sgyu ma tshol
166a4(mdo sde): ba med pa'i phyir/ /bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams/ /'khor gsum po dag de dag rnam par sbyong / /shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims brgyan gyur te/ /gzugs brnyan sgyu ma brag ca 'dra ba'i phyir/ /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems/ /
166a5(mdo sde): 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong / /shes rab kyis ni bzod pa brgyan gyur te/ /mkhas dang mtho min dma' bar 'gyur min dang / /dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu rab rtog pa/ /'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong / /shes rab kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan
166a6(mdo sde): gyur te/ /skyo ba med cing bsam pa brtan pa dang / /de ni blang ba med cing dor med pa/ /'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong / /shes rab kyis ni bsam gtan brgyan gyur te/ /de la ma chags gyur dang lhag mthong dang / /mkhas dang mngon par shes
166a7(mdo sde): pa skyed pa dang / /'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong / /shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang brgyan byed de/ /shin tu sdud dang gzungs dang yang dag smon/ /'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam sbyong zhing / /sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing rnams sbyong / /dran
166b1(mdo sde): pa nye bar gzhag la dran mi 'jug / yang dag spong ba rnams la gnyis med de/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang dben/ /sems can gyis ni dbang po kun mi shes/ /bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil mi non/ /chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes
166b2(mdo sde): su rtogs/ /de bzhin lam la 'ong med 'gro ba med/ /'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan/ /de ni shin tu zhi bas zhi gnas shes/ /de yi lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas te/ /chos kyi phung po ci bzhin phung po shes/ /khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs
166b3(mdo sde): shing 'dra bar shes/ /des ni stong pa lta bur skye mched shes/ /rten pas bsags pas chos rnams 'byung med de/ /don dam bden par 'khrugs pa med par shes/ /tshul bzhin gyis ni nges par rtogs par shes/ /dus gsum la ni chags med ye shes
166b4(mdo sde): 'jug / rnam par gzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shes/ /dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan nyid gcig tu shes/ /'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan/ /rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes/ /yongs brtags rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhin no/ /
166b5(mdo sde): rnam 'phrul mtshan nyid smig rgyu 'dra ba ste/ /'pho med chos rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid do/ /'du 'phrod byung ba mig yor lta bu ste/ /rkyen rnams kyis ni brag ca ji bzhin no/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu ma 'dres shes/ /de bzhin nyid ni gnas med de
166b6(mdo sde): rab shes/ /yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mi g.yo chos/ /'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med/ /shes rab zab cing blo ni rab yangs par/ /brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol bar byed/ /de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa med/ /chos rnams
166b7(mdo sde): kun tu 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed/ /don dang tshig 'bru la ni rtag tu mkhas/ /nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs khong chud/ /chags med tshig dang rtsub pa ma yin dang / /rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang med tshig /thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang / /
167a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa de ni ye shes rton par byed/ /nges don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes/ /gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing / /'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton/ /de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin/ /de yi tshig ni bden
167a2(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su 'thun/ /gzung bar 'os dang dus su 'os pa yin/ /de yi chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod/ /phyed pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug /de yi spobs pa mgyogs pa skye ba ste/ /shugs can dang ni myur dang rtag mi chags/ /rgyun chad med dang 'khrul
167a3(mdo sde): med nges pa'i tshig / legs par brgyus pa'i phreng bas legs brgyan bzhin/ /lha dang klu yi skad ni rab tu shes/ /gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lha min dang / /mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes/ /'khor lhags
167a4(mdo sde): shes nas spa gong med pa ste/ /smra ba mthong nas zhum par gyur pa'ang med/ /'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtam yang rjod/ /'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mthong snrel zhi yi/ /gtam brjod rnal 'byor mthong nas rjes
167a5(mdo sde): su 'thun/ /nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston/ /yul mngon chags la sreg pa'i bskal pa ste/ /theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i gtam yang rjod/ /dogs pa kun gyi the tshom gcod pa ste/ /blo yi chos rnams mngon sum 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi shes rab
167a6(mdo sde): nam yang gzhan mi ltos/ /yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad mi shes/ /don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun chags te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod/ /de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin/ /kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas
167a7(mdo sde): shes/ /rnam par byang ba'i phan yon thug pa med/ /de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes/ /sangs rgyas gnang ba'i so so rig pa thob/ /de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa ste/ /de yi yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang / /bskal par rgyun
167b1(mdo sde): chad med par rab brjod kyang / /yon tan mtha' ni rtogs par mi nus so// //bam po gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu snang ba
167b2(mdo sde): gang dag gis snang bar gyur na byang chub sems dpa' mun pa mun nag dang bral zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa spyod par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa'i
167b3(mdo sde): snang ba dang / blo gros kyi snang ba dang / rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / chos kyi snang ba dang / shes pa'i snang ba dang / bden pa'i snang ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i snang ba dang / sgrub pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang
167b4(mdo sde): ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
167b5(mdo sde): chud mi gzon pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa sogs pa dang / thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / don rnam par nges pa rjes su thob pa dang / yul drug gis mi 'phrogs pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos spang zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs
167b6(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir dran pa rgya chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / de dran pa phun sum tshogs par rig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi grong khyer srung bar 'jog pa dang / dran pa sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin te/
167b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don gyi blo gros yin gyi tshig 'bru'i blo gros ma yin
168a1(mdo sde): pa dang / ye shes kyi blo gros yin gyi rnam par shes pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / chos kyi blo gros yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / rig pa'i blo gros yin gyi 'gal ba'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi blo gros
168a2(mdo sde): yin gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / rlabs po che'i blo gros yin gyi dman pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi blo gros yin gyi bdud kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / snying rje chen po'i blo gros yin gyi sems can la rnam par 'tshe
168a3(mdo sde): ba'i blo gros ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams
168a4(mdo sde): cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / dgongs te bstan pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa rnams rtogs par khong
168a5(mdo sde): du chud par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / snrel zhi'i rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sangs
168a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/
168a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa ston pas 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / thar pa 'dod pa rnams la shes rab kyis ston pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / lam shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir sgrib pa med
168b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'dod pa dang / srid pa dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa mi slong ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi nges par gyur pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / glo bur
168b2(mdo sde): gyi nyon mongs pa la shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi snang ba dang / chos rnams shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste/
168b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brgyad pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / rgyun
168b4(mdo sde): du zhugs pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes
168b5(mdo sde): pa'i snang ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di
168b6(mdo sde): dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gis nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu dang po 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu
168b7(mdo sde): gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu gsum pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang
169a1(mdo sde): gis rang sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
169a2(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
169a3(mdo sde): lha'i mig gis gzugs thams cad yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir gsal ba'i snang ba dang / lha'i rna bas sgra thams cad thos pa'i phyir nges par rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / sngon gyi gnas bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran pa'i phyir rjes su dran pa'i snang ba dang / sems can
169a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems la lta ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i phyir nam mkha' sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba dang / zag pa med pa'i shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir shes pa'i snang
169a5(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa'i phyir ye shes kyi tshogs kyi snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po
169a6(mdo sde): 'di dag go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrub pas ye shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas shes rab kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas blo'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i
169a7(mdo sde): snang ba dang / sgrub pas zhi gnas kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas lhag mthong gi snang ba dang / sgrub pas sems can gyi bsam pa'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas 'khrugs pa med par sems rnam par grol ba'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas shin tu mthar thug pa'i snang ba snang ba
169b1(mdo sde): ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /dran pa de dang yang dag 'dres pa ni/ /sngon chad las dge bsags pa chud mi gzon/ /
169b2(mdo sde): phra bar sngo ba phun sum tshogs pa de/ /phyi phyir zhing ni yang dag sgrub par byed/ /thos pa'i chos rnams la ni brjed pa med/ /rnam par nges pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /nye bar zhi bas yul rnams las ni sbas/ /dran dang ldan pa mi dge rnams dang bral/ /dran
169b3(mdo sde): pa rgya bo che ni shin tu bsags/ /bya ba bya ba dag ni rnam par 'byed/ /dran pa dag dang ldan par rig nas ni/ /rgyal ba rang byung dag gi byin gyis rlob/ /dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer skyong byed pa/ /de ni 'gro ba rnams la chos ston nus/ /shes rab ldan pa mun
169b4(mdo sde): pa rnam bral te/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed/ /blo gros bzang ldan snang ba thob gyur nas/ /dogs pa dang ni the tsom rnams kyang gcod/ /dran dang ldan pa rang 'byung ye shes kyis/ /byang chub myur du rjes su rtogs par byed/ /de ni don gyi blo gros
169b5(mdo sde): can yin gyi/ /tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug sgra la'ang min/ /sems can dag pa ye shes blo gros can/ /rnam par shes pa'i blo gros 'dod ma yin/ /chos kyi blo gros ldan par gyur pa de/ /nyon mongs blo gros sel cing gti mug bral/ /shes rab dang
169b6(mdo sde): ni thabs kyi tshul shes pa/ /de ni rgyal ba'i byang chub 'gal mi byed/ /de ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i blo gros ldan/ /nyan thos 'gyur min rang rgyal 'gyur ma yin/ /rtag tu rlabs chen blo gros can yin gyi/ /de ni blo gros chung ngu 'dod ma yin/ /sangs
169b7(mdo sde): rgyas blo gros rtag tu ldan yin gyi/ /bdud kyi blo gros su ni 'gyur ma yin/ /blo gros ldan pa snying rje cher gzhol gyi/ /sems can gang la'ang rnam par 'tshe ba min/ /chos 'ga' bstan pa gang yin de la ni/ /the tshom med cing rtogs par khong du chud/ /
170a1(mdo sde): de ni dgongs te gsung la mkhas 'gyur zhing / /sems can spyod pa rnams la rtogs dang ldan/ /so so yang dag rig la rtogs ldan zhing / /de yi shes pa 'jug pa chags pa med/ /rkyen byung byed pa po dang rnam bral bar/ /rten pa'i chos rnams
170a2(mdo sde): dag ni rab tu shes/ /de ni snrel zhi'i rgyu la mkhas gyur cing / /spyi'u tshugs tshul ni rtogs par khong du chud/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams ji snyed pa/ /thams cad kyang ni rtogs par khong du chud/ /'jig rten pa yi chos kyi snang ba yis/ /lha mi rnams
170a3(mdo sde): kyi las kyi bya ba shes/ /'jig rten las ni 'das pa'i ye shes kyis/ /shes rab snang ba dang ni ldan pa yin/ /kha na ma thor bcas dang ma tho med/ /ye shes rab tu gsal ba chen po 'jug /lam ni shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir/ /rtag tu 'bras
170a4(mdo sde): bu yod par chos ston to/ /zag par bcas dang zag pa med pa yi/ /chos la de yi snang ba rab tu 'jug /de ni zag pa thams cad spong byed cing / /lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed/ /'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas chos rnams la/ /de yi shes pa rtag
170a5(mdo sde): tu rab tu 'jug / de ni de yis dri bral rab rib med/ /skyon med thob nas spyad pa rnams kyang spyod/ /rnam par byang dang kun nas nyon mongs la/ /de yi shes pa sgrib pa med pa 'jug /rang bzhin gyis ni sems 'od gsal ba dang / /kun nas nyon mongs
170a6(mdo sde): pa yi tshul yang shes/ /ji ltar mya ngan 'das par gyur pa ni/ /skye ba med cing 'byung ba med par shes/ /'di 'dra 'di ni theg pa chen po la/ /chos kyi snang ba mtha' yas gyur pa yin/ /de ni brgyad pa yi ni shes pa dang / /rgyun du zhugs la shes pa
170a7(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / /lan cig phyir 'ong ba yi shes pa dang / /phyir mi 'ong la shes pa 'jug pa dang / /de ni dgra bcom pa dang rang rgyal dang / /'jig rten mgon po byang chub sems dpa' dag /kun la de yi shes dang sgrub pa rnams/ /lhag ma lus pa
170b1(mdo sde): med par rab tu 'jug / gang gis 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / /'khrugs med don dam nges par 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de la rab bsgoms smra ba dpa' bo rnams/ /bden pa'i snang ba dag dang ldan pa yin/ /bden pa dag ni bsgom pa byas pas na/ /skyon
170b2(mdo sde): med 'jug dang 'bras bu dang po 'thob/ /gnyis dang gsum dang de bzhin bzhi pa dang / /rang rgyal rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /bsgom pa gang gis su ni smra ba'i stag /de dag bzod pa dag ni 'thob 'gyur dang / /gang gis rgyal ba byang chub 'tshang
170b3(mdo sde): rgya ba/ /bden pa de dag la ni snang bar 'gyur/ /lha yi mig gis su ni de yis kyang / /gzugs kyi rnam pa dag ni thams cad mthong / /lha yi rna ba nges par rtogs pa yis/ /phyogs bcu dag gi sgra rnams rtogs par 'gyur/ /sngon gyi gnas shes pa yi
170b4(mdo sde): snang ba yis/ /bskal pa khrag khrig dag ni rjes su dran/ /'od gsal ba yi shes pa'i snang ba yis/ /gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams la mkhas/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni shes pa'i snang ba yis/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing ni khrag khrig rnams su 'gro/ /zag
170b5(mdo sde): pa med pa'i shes pa'i snang ba ni/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin/ /bsod nams kyi ni snang ba mtha' yas pa'i/ /mngon shes thog ma 'gro ba nye bar 'gro/ /de yi shes pa chags pa med pa yis/ /'gro ba'i dogs pa dag ni gcod par byed/ /
170b6(mdo sde): nan tan snying por byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dran dang blo gros rtogs dang chos shes snang / /bden pa yi ni snang ba mtha' yas te/ /mngon par shes pa'i snang bar gyur pa yin/ /sgrub pas ye shes dang ni shes rab dang / /rgya chen blo dang spobs pa mtha' yas
170b7(mdo sde): dang / /yang dag lta ba dang ni lhag mthong dang / /shin tu 'khrugs pa med pa mthar thug gyur/ /snang ba shin tu rnam par dag pa brgyad/ /'di dag mthu chen gang la yod pa ni/ /re zhig byang chub thob par ma gyur kyang / /de ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par
171a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa bcu drug gis sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /
171a2(mdo sde): bcu drug gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa/ lta ba sna tshogs dang 'dres pa dag ste/ lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems
171a3(mdo sde): can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log tu gyur nas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la
171a4(mdo sde): sdug par 'du shes pa dag ste/ phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa/ dngos
171a5(mdo sde): po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa dag ste/ ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sgrib pa lngas bsgribs te 'dod pa'i
171a6(mdo sde): zug rngus zug pa/ khong khro ba mang ba/ rmugs pa dang gnyid la chags pa/ dam pa ma yin pa la 'gyod pa kun nas langs pa/ zab mo'i chos la nges pa ma thob pa dag ste/ sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can
171a7(mdo sde): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di ni skye mched drug gis chags pas chags te/ mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa yin/ rna bas sgra thos/ snas dri snams/
171b1(mdo sde): lces ro myangs/ lus kyis reg bya rnams la reg /yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dag yin te/ skye mched drug gis chags pa spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams
171b2(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / snyam pa'i nga rgyal
171b3(mdo sde): dang / log pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pas/ chung ngu dag pas bdag cag che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/ mtshungs pa dag pas ni bdag cag che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa dang / ches che ba dag pas kyang bdag cag ches
171b4(mdo sde): che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/ gzugs la bdag tu khas len pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag tu khas len pa/ ma thob par bdag la thob pa snyam du shes pa/ bdag cag ni 'phags pa'o snyam du bdag la sems pa/ log pa'i lta ba
171b5(mdo sde): la yang dag pa'i lta bar mos pa dag ste/ nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lam ngan par zhugs pa/ 'phags
171b6(mdo sde): pa'i lam dang bral ba dag ste/ lam ngan pa spang zhing 'phags pa'i lam thob par bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sred pa'i khol po chung ma dang /
171b7(mdo sde): bu pho dang / bu mo la yongs su zhen pas sbags pa/ rang dbang med pas bdag la mi dpogs pa dag ste/ rang dbang yod cing bdag la dpogs par bya ba dang / gar dga' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams
172a1(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni phan tshun mi 'phrod pa/ khro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gnod sems mang ba dag ste/ khro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gnod sems spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag
172a2(mdo sde): la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i las byed pa dag ste/ dge ba'i
172a3(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni brkam pa/ chags pas
172a4(mdo sde): zil gyis non pa/ chog mi shes shing 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi gnas pa dang bral ba dag ste/ chags pa spangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje
172a5(mdo sde): chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med par lta zhing rtag pa dang chad pa la gnas pa dag ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo dang / las dang / bya ba la gzud pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du
172a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni ma rig pa dang gti mug gis ldongs pa/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag la mngon par zhen pa dag ste/
172a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par bya ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba la
172b1(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba/ phung po lnga'i gshed mas yongs su zin pa dag ste/ khams gsum thams cad las dbyung ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni
172b2(mdo sde): bdud kyi zhags pa'i bcing bas bcings pa/ g.yo ba dang / rlom sems la gnas pa dag ste/ bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa thams cad las rnam par dgrol ba dang / g.yo dang rlom sems spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems
172b3(mdo sde): can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo bcad cing / ngan 'gro'i sgo phye ba dag ste/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba dang / ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par
172b4(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa bcu drug po de dag gis sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las ma
172b5(mdo sde): 'dres pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ de dag la brtson na byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams yin no/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dag gti mug gi gnyid kyis log pa dang / bdag shes rab kyis
172b6(mdo sde): sad pa mthong nas shes rab kyis sems can rnams sad par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i las ma 'dres pa dang po'o/ /sems can dag chung ngu la mos pa dang / bdag rgya chen po la mos par mthong nas theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang dag par
172b7(mdo sde): 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / bdag chos la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams chos 'dod pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dang / bdag 'tsho ba yongs su dag par mthong
173a1(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams 'tsho ba yongs su dag par sbyor ba dang / sems can dag lta bar gyur par bying ba dang / bdag yang dag pa'i lta bar zhugs par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems
173a2(mdo sde): c an dag ma rig par gyur cing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa bsags par mthong zhing bdag rig pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par rig nas sems can rnams rig pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu
173a3(mdo sde): 'god pa dang / sems can dag log pa'i chos la gnas pa dang / bdag yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par mthong nas yang dag pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can dag ser sna can du gyur te kun tu 'dzin pa'i
173a4(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa dang / bdag bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar mthong nas sems can rnams bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag ngang tshul ngan pa can du gyur te/ sdom pa la mi gnas pa dang / bdag tshul
173a5(mdo sde): khrims yongs su dag par gnas nas/ sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag gnod sems mang zhing khro ba shas che ba dang / bdag bzod pa'i stobs dang / byams pa la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams
173a6(mdo sde): bzod pa'i stobs dang / byams pa la gnas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag le lo can du gyur te/ brtson 'grus chung ba dang / bdag le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams par mthong nas sems can rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa la sbyor
173a7(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can dag sems g.yengs shing dran pa nyams pa dang / bdag mnyam par bzhag ste/ bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed par mthong nas sems can rnams sems mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin la rab tu 'god pa dang /
173b1(mdo sde): sems can dag shes rab 'chal par gyur te/ dman zhing gti mug dang ldan pa dang / bdag shes rab dang ldan zhing gti mug dang bral bar mthong nas sems can rnams shes rab chen po dang / gti mug dang bral ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /
173b2(mdo sde): sems can dag rigs pa ma yin par lhung zhing ya nga ba'i byed pa brtsams pa dang / bdag thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yang dag pa'i las brtsams par mthong nas sems can rnams thabs mkhas pa dang / yang dag pa'i las rtsom pa yang dag par 'dzin du
173b3(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / sems can dag nyon mongs pas bcom zhing kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul par gyur pa dang / bdag nyon mongs pa thams cad las log par mthong nas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad
173b4(mdo sde): spong ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i bcing bas bcings shing dmigs pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / bdag 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa dang ldan zhing dmigs pas bcings pa las yongs su grol bar
173b5(mdo sde): mthong nas sems can rnams 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa dang dmigs pa dang bral ba la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag ma dul zhing ma sbas te byang ba ma yin pa dang / bdag dul zhing sbas te byang bar mthong nas sems can rnams dul ba dang / sbas
173b6(mdo sde): pa dang / byang ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi shes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pa dang / bdag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes te dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung bar gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams byas pa gzo ba
173b7(mdo sde): dang / byas pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag chu bor lhung zhing sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du song ba dang / bdag chu bo thams cad las yang dag par 'das par mthong nas sems can rnams chu bo
174a1(mdo sde): thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag bka' blo mi bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang / bdag bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin par mthong nas sems can rnams bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin
174a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag phongs pa mang zhing dam pa ma yin pa la yongs su zhen pa dang / bdag ma phongs pa mang zhing dge ba bdud rtsi la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams yongs su zhen pa dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la
174a3(mdo sde): gnas par sbyor ba dang / sems can dag dbul zhing 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba dang / bdag 'phags pa'i nor dang ma bral zhing nor bdun dang ldan par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i nor thob par bya ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag rtag
174a4(mdo sde): tu na zhing khams rnam pa bzhi po'i sbrul gdug pas zin pa dang / bdag nad med cing bde la 'gyur ba med par mthong nas sems can rnams nad thams cad spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag mi shes pa'i mun pas kun tu gtibs
174a5(mdo sde): shing ye shes kyi snang ba dang bral ba dang / bdag ye shes kyi snang ba thob par mthong nas sems can rnams ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag khams gsum la chags pas chags shing rgyud lnga'i 'gro ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor
174a6(mdo sde): lo'i rjes su 'jug pa mthong zhing bdag khams gsum yongs su shes pa la mkhas par shes nas sems can rnams khams gsum yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag g.yon phyogs kyi lam du zhugs shing
174a7(mdo sde): g.yas phyogs kyi lam dang bral ba dang / bdag g.yas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams g.yas phyogs kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag lus dang srog la chags shing nyes pa ma mthong ba dang / bdag lus dang
174b1(mdo sde): srog la mi lta zhing nyes pa mthong ba yin par mthong nas sems can rnams lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / nyes pa mthong ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang bral ba dang / bdag dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs
174b2(mdo sde): rgyun mi gcod par gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dzud pa dang / sems can rnams dam pa'i chos las nyams pa dang / bdag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams
174b3(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag ston pa rin po che dang ring du gnas shing / rjes su dran pa drug dang bral ba dang / bdag rjes su dran pa drug ma btang ba mthong nas sems can rnams rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa la rab tu 'god
174b4(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can dag las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / bdag las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar mthong nas sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang
174b5(mdo sde): ldan zhing dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par mthong nas sems can rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed
174b6(mdo sde): pa la rab tu 'god pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i las sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag phul yin te/ de dag la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi
174b7(mdo sde): bu yang byang chub sems dpa'i las ni tshad med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyed par byang chub sems dpas rnam par byang ba'i sgo yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba yang de snyed do/ /rigs kyi bu gal te gang dag gang
175a1(mdo sde): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur kyang sems can de dag thams cad kyi las gang yin pa de sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub
175a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i las kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang
175a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dag ni rang gi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa spong bar nye bar gnas pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong bar nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi las gang yin pa dang / nyan
175a4(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las gang yin pa bas 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i las nyid mchog ces brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi las ni phyin ci log dang ldan pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las
175a5(mdo sde): ni nyi tshe ba dang ldan pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ni phyin ci log med cing tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i yon tan rtsom pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'dis sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non to/ /
175a6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di
175a7(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las legs par gsungs pa de dag ni ngo
175b1(mdo sde): mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug /de bzhin gshegs
175b2(mdo sde): pa'i thugs rje chen po ni ci tsam/ rnam pa ni gang lags/ rtags ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ gnas ni gang lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'phrin las ni ji ltar mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las ni ci tsam/
175b3(mdo sde): rnam pa ni gang lags/ rtags ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ gnas ni gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las rnams mngon sum du gyur pas mngon sum du bdag
175b4(mdo sde): cag la legs par yang dag par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig
175b5(mdo sde): dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las la 'jug pa tsam cung zad cig khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni skye ba yang med/ 'jug pa
175b6(mdo sde): yang med do zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni rtag tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni bskal pa grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pas yang dag par bskyed pa ste/ 'jug pa yang med/ ldog pa yang
175b7(mdo sde): med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni ma btang ba/ sems can thams cad la gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po de ni ci tsam du las yongs su thob par bya bar sla ba ma yin pa de tsam du tshad med/ de tsam du
176a1(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de tsam du mi zad cing / de tsam du ring du song ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar byang chub thob pa de ltar sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /byang chub ci 'dra ba thugs rje chen
176a2(mdo sde): po yang de 'dra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas med par byang chub thob bo/ /de la rtsa ba ni gang / gnas ni gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o/ /yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa ni
176a3(mdo sde): gnas so/ /de gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par yongs su shes te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang gnas med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag
176a4(mdo sde): gis ni rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas med pa'i chos 'di dag khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ni zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'o/ /de la zhi ba ni gang / nye
176a5(mdo sde): bar zhi ba ni gang zhe na/ nang ni zhi ba'o/ /phyi ni nye bar zhi ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de ni de'i rang bzhin no/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de ni de'i rang bzhin no/ /mig stong par
176a6(mdo sde): yongs su shes nas gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /rna ba stong par yongs su shes nas sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /sna stong par yongs su shes nas dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir
176a7(mdo sde): nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /lce stong par yongs su shes nas ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /lus stong par yongs su shes nas reg bya rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /yid stong par yongs su shes nas chos
176b1(mdo sde): rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag gis ni zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba khong du ma chud pas de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu sems rang
176b2(mdo sde): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir byang chub rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o/ /ci'i phyir rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes bya zhe na/ rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin/ nam mkha' dang mnyam par
176b3(mdo sde): gzhol ba/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam pa ste/ rang bzhin de ni shin tu 'od gsal ba nyid do/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba 'di khong du ma chud pas glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs te/ rang bzhin 'od gsal
176b4(mdo sde): ba de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'o/ /de la blang ba med pa ni gang / dor ba med pa ni gang zhe na/ blang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni
176b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o/ /dor ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'dor ba'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med par chu bor 'jug pa na/ ji ltar de bzhin nyid la pha rol med pa dang / pha rol med pa ma yin par yang dag
176b6(mdo sde): par rjes su mthong ba de ltar rgal to/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad pha rol med pa dang / pha rol dang bral bar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis ni blang ba
176b7(mdo sde): med pa dang / dor ba med pa 'di khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ni mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'o/ /de la mtshan ma med
177a1(mdo sde): pa ni gang / dmigs pa med pa ni gang zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/ /gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med
177a2(mdo sde): pa'o/ /sgra mnyan du med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/ /dri bsnam du med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/ /ro myang du med pa ni
177a3(mdo sde): dmigs pa med pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/ /reg bya reg par byar med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/ /chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni
177a4(mdo sde): dmigs pa med pa'o/ /de ltar na mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ /'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ /de
177a5(mdo sde): ltar na gang spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /
177a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ dus gsum mnyam pa 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'o/ /de la 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa gang zhe na/ gang 'das pa la sems mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
177a7(mdo sde): la rnam par shes pa mi rgyug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yid la byed pa mi 'jug pa'o/ /de sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas 'das pa la rtog par mi byed/ ma 'ongs pa la mi sems/ da ltar byung ba spros par mi byed do/ /de ltar
177b1(mdo sde): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ni lus med cing
177b2(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de la lus med pa ni gang mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba
177b3(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas med pa ste/ de ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral ba'i 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o/ /'dus ma byas ji lta bar 'dus byas kyang de bzhin du khong du chud par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin
177b4(mdo sde): pa de ni med pa'o/ /med pa gang yin pa de la ni gnyis med do/ /lus med pa dang 'dus ma byas 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /
177b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba de ni dbyer med pa dang gnas so/ /de la gnas ni gang / dbyer med pa ni gang zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ni gnas so/ /gnas med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings ni gnas so/ /tha dad pa ma yin pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /yang
177b6(mdo sde): dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas so/ /g.yo ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /stong pa nyid ni gnas so/ /dmigs su med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa ni gnas so/ /rnam par rtog pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa ni gnas so/ /smon lam
177b7(mdo sde): 'debs pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /sems can med pa nyid ni gnas so/ /sems can ngo bo nyid med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /nam mkha' ni gnas so/ /dmigs su med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /skye ba med pa ni gnas so/ /'gog pa med pa ni dbyer
178a1(mdo sde): med pa'o/ /'dus ma byas ni gnas so/ /rgyu ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /byang chub ni gnas so/ /nye bar zhi ba ni dbyer med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so/ /mngon par grub pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /de ltar dbyer med pa
178a2(mdo sde): dang / gnas 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ni lus kyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/ sems kyis kyang
178a3(mdo sde): ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni bems po'o/ /sems ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /gang lus dang sems 'di lta bur khong du chud pa de ni tha snyad btags nas byang chub ces bya'i/ byang chub ni lus sam/ sems sam/ chos sam/ chos ma yin pa'am/ yang
178a4(mdo sde): dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'am/ bden pa'am/ pa gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /byang chub ni gang gis tshig tu tha snyad gdags par 'gyur ba'i dbyibs
178a5(mdo sde): ci yang med de/ ji ltar nam mkha' dbyibs med cing brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub kyang dbyibs med cing brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su btsal na chos thams cad ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ chos la
178a6(mdo sde): tshig med do/ /tshig la yang chos med do/ /chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ni
178a7(mdo sde): gzung du med pa dang / gzhi med pa'o/ /de la gzung du med pa ni gang / gzhi med pa ni gang zhe na/ mig yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o/ /gzugs dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/ /rna ba yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o/ /sgra
178b1(mdo sde): dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/ /sna yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o/ /dri dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/ /lce yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o/ /ro dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/ /lus yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med
178b2(mdo sde): pa'o/ /reg bya dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/ /yid yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o/ /chos dmigs su med pa ni gzhi med pa'o/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub gzung du med pa dang / gzhi med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
178b3(mdo sde): rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mig gzung du med/ gzugs gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/ /rna ba gzung du med/ sgra gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/ /sna gzung du med/ dri gzhi ma yin/
178b4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/ /lce gzung du med/ ro gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/ /lus gzung du med/ reg bya gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/ /yid gzung du med/ chos gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa
178b5(mdo sde): gnas pa med do/ /de rnam par shes pa gnas pa med pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi gnas rnams rab tu shes so/ /sems can dag gi sems kyi gnas rnams gang zhe na/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas ni bzhi po 'di dag go/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
178b6(mdo sde): ste/ gzugs sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dag sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas te/ sems kyi gnas de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnas med par mkhyen to/ /gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems
178b7(mdo sde): can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig so/ /stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa'i stong
179a1(mdo sde): pa nyid des chos thams cad stong ngo / /stong pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du chos de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin no/ /de ni 'di lta ste/
179a2(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang byang chub ces bya ba tshul gcig par shes pa ste/ de la gnyis gang gis stong pa nyid dang / byang chub gnyis su dbye ba'i gnyis kyang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gnyis su med pa/ gnyis su dbyer med pa/ mtshan nyid
179a3(mdo sde): med pa/ ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ rab tu rgyu ba med pa/ kun tu 'byung ba med pa'o/ /gang stong pa zhes bya ba de ni mngon par zhen pa med cing 'dzin pa med pa'i tshig so/ /'di la don dam par gang stong pa zhes bya ba'i chos gang
179a4(mdo sde): yang dmigs su med kyang stong pa zhes kyang brjod do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la nam mkha' zhes rjod kyang nam mkha' ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de bzhin du stong pa la stong pa zhes rjod kyang stong pa ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ ming med pa la ming du tha
179a5(mdo sde): snyad 'dogs pa de ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'o/ /ming de yang yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no/ /ji ltar ming yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin pa de bzhin du ming gang gis chos gang brjod pa'i chos de yang
179a6(mdo sde): yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag thams cad mkhyen te/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral
179a7(mdo sde): ba dang / yi ge med pa dang / sgra med par shes so/ /ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du rnam par grol te/ bcings pa yang med/ grol ba yang med do/ /mnyam pa nyid 'di yang byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam
179b1(mdo sde): du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ni nam mkha' dang mnyam ste/ nam mkha' ni mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub kyang mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin no/ /
179b2(mdo sde): chos gang la yang dag par yongs su grub pa med pa de mnyam pa'am mi mnyam par brjod pa ma yin no/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ ji ltar chos tsam
179b3(mdo sde): yang mnyam par yang mi byed/ mi mnyam par yang mi byed pa de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /chos 'di dag ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen to/ /yang dag pa'i ye shes kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni rtsa ba
179b4(mdo sde): med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa ste/ de dag ni ma byung ba las 'byung ba/ byung nas kyang 'bral ba'o/ /de dag ni bdag po med par 'byung ba/ bdag po med par 'bral ba'o/ /de ltar 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la brten nas 'jug kyang 'di la 'jug pa gang yang
179b5(mdo sde): med de/ lam bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to zhes kyang brjod do/ /lam chad pa de yang sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /
179b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba de ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas so/ /de la ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas gang zhe na/ byang chub ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/ /byang chub ji lta bar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
179b7(mdo sde): par shes pa yang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/ /byang chub ji lta bar/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/ /byang chub ji lta bar mig gi khams
180a1(mdo sde): dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/ /byang chub ji lta bar rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang /
180a2(mdo sde): dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos
180a3(mdo sde): kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/ /chos su btags pa ni 'di dag tu zad de/ 'di ltar phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched du btags pa'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas ji lta ba bzhin du mngon
180a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /phyin ci ma log par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de dag ni sngon gyi ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin bar du yang de bzhin te/ sngon gyi mthar yang ma skyes/ phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho/ bar du yang dben pa dag go/ /de ltar na
180a5(mdo sde): 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas yin no/ /gcig ji lta bar thams cad kyang de bzhin/ thams cad ji lta bar gcig kyang de bzhin te/ ji lta ba bzhin la ni gcig pa'am mang bar mi dmigs so/ /ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas 'di 'ang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong
180a6(mdo sde): du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ni rnam pa la 'jug pas rnam pa med pa la zhugs pa'o/ /de la rnam pa ni gang / rnam pa med pa ni gang zhe na/ rnam
180a7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad rtsom pa'o/ /rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/ /rnam pa zhes bya ba ni gnas pa med pa'i sems kyi gnas so/ /rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/ /
180b1(mdo sde): rnam pa zhes bya ba ni chos rnams la sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / bgrang ba dang / so sor rtog pa'o/ /rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni 'jal ba las shin tu 'das pa'o/ /'jal ba las shin tu 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang la rnam par shes pa'i las med pa'o/ /
180b2(mdo sde): rnam pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas la so sor rtog pa'o/ /rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas la mngon sum du byed pa'o/ /rnam pa dang rnam pa med pa la 'jug pa 'di yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du
180b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ni zag pa med pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa'o/ /de la zag pa med pa ni gang / nye bar len pa med pa ni gang zhe na/ zag pa med pa zhes bya ba ni zag pa bzhi dang
180b4(mdo sde): bral ba'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i zag pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /nye bar len pa med pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa bzhi dang bral ba'i phyir te/
180b5(mdo sde): 'di ltar 'dod pa'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba dang / bdag tu smra ba'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /de la nye bar len pa bzhi po 'di
180b6(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang ma rig pas mun par byas shing sred pas bsnyen te/ bdag go snyam du mngon par zhen pas nye bar len pa dag go/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nye bar len pa'i rtsa ba yongs su shes nas/ bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par
180b7(mdo sde): dag par rtogs so/ /bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /gnyis su med pa'i don gang yin pa de skye ba med do/ /skye ba dang 'gag pa med pas sems dang /
181a1(mdo sde): yid dang / rnam par shes pa rnams mi 'jug go/ /gang la sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa de la yongs su rtog pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yongs su rtog pa gang yang med do/ /der tshul bzhin
181a2(mdo sde): yid la byed pa dang ldan pas ma rig pa kun nas mi slong ngo / /gang ma rig pa kun nas mi ldang ba de srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ngo / /gang srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ba de mi skye ba'o/ /gang mi skye ba de nges par gyur pa'o/ /gang
181a3(mdo sde): nges par gyur pa de nges pa'i don to/ /nges pa'i don gang yin pa de don dam pa'o/ /don dam pa gang yin pa de gang zag med pa'i don to/ /gang zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de brjod du med pa'i don to/ /brjod du med pa'i don gang yin pa de rten cing 'brel par 'byung
181a4(mdo sde): ba'i don to/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don gang yin pa de chos kyi don to/ /chos kyi don gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid kyi don to/ /de bzhin nyid kyi don gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i don to/ /des na sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong
181a5(mdo sde): ngo / /sus chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo zhes bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin nyid kyis yongs su btsal na ci yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo / /de la ci yang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma dang dmigs pa'o/ /des gang gi tshe sems
181a6(mdo sde): med pa dang dmigs pa med par mthong ba de'i tshe yang dag pa mthong ngo / /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zag pa med pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa 'di yang sems can rnams kyis
181a7(mdo sde): khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub ni dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /de la dag pa ni gang / dri ma med pa ni gang /
181b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa ni gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni dag pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /skye ba med pa ni dag pa'o/ /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /'byung ba med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /
181b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin ni dag pa'o/ /yongs su dag pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /'od gsal ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /spros pa med pa ni dag pa'o/ /ma spros pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni dag pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings ni dri
181b3(mdo sde): ma med pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /skabs 'byed pa ni dag pa'o/ /nam mkha' ni dri ma med pa'o/ /nam mkha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /nang yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o/ /phyi rol du mi rgyu ba ni dri ma med pa'o/ /nang dang phyi mi dmigs
181b4(mdo sde): pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /phung po yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o/ /khams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dri ma med pa'o/ /skye mched 'dor ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /'das pa la zad par shes pa ni dag pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa la mi skye bar shes pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /da ltar byung
181b5(mdo sde): ba la chos kyi dbyings gnas par shes pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /de ltar na dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa ni 'di lta ste/ zhi ba'i gnas kyi gnas gcig tu yang dag par 'du'o/ /zhi ba gang yin pa de rab tu zhi ba'o/ /rab tu zhi ba gang yin pa
181b6(mdo sde): de nye bar zhi ba'o/ /nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa de nye bar zhi bar byed pas mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o/ /mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa de nye bar zhi ba'o/ /nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa de blo gros zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na nam mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no/ /byang
