263b5(mdo sde): dbyings gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dbyings so/ /de bas na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du'o zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni gar yang 'gro ba'ang med/ mi 'gro ba'ang med do/ /chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/ gang bdag
263b6(mdo sde): gi dbyings shes pa des chos kyi dbyings kyang shes so/ /de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang bdag gi dbyings de dag mi gnyis so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag rnam par dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rnam par dag pa ste/
263b7(mdo sde): gang rnam par dag pa de rab tu snang ba'o/ /gang rab tu snang ba de bla gab med pa'o/ /gang bla gab med pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs med do/ /gang mtshan ma med pa de la gnas pa gang yang med de/ mi gnas pa ni nam mkha'o/ /gang de ltar ye shes kyi rjes su
264a1(mdo sde): 'gro zhing ye shes des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gang tshul khrims
264a2(mdo sde): las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims las kyang mi nyams pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa thams cad las kyang mi 'gyur ba'o/ /shes rab las kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos thams cad rgyu ba
264a3(mdo sde): med par yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing sems gnyis pa la yang mi gnas pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing shes pa thams cad la yang mi chags pa'o/ /stobs las sangs
264a4(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran zhing dus gsum mtshungs pa'i ye shes las kyang mi g.yo ba'o/ /mi 'jigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing zag pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu yang mi gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings
264a5(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang gzugs las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
264a6(mdo sde): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi
264a7(mdo sde): mthong la/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o/ /gang yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni yid la byed pa thams cad med de/ lta ba thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'o/ /
264b1(mdo sde): gang de lta bu rnyog pa med pa'i dran pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang spyod lam thams cad du sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mi byed do/ /'greng ba dang /
264b2(mdo sde): 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / smra ba dang / mi smra bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mi byed do/ /de mngon par ma chags pas dran pa'ang dran par mi byed mi dran pa'ang dran par mi byed do/ /de dran pa yid la mi byed
264b3(mdo sde): pas gzugs dang / mtshan dang chos nyid du'ang sangs rgyas rjes su mi dran no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste gang la mtshan ma dang dmigs pa thams cad kun du spyod pa med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
264b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ chos zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags med pa'o/ /de la gang chos ci la chags kyang rung de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /chos zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o/ /de la gang chos gang la
264b5(mdo sde): sbyor ba de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /chos zhes bya ba ni nye bar zhi ba ste/ gang sems dang yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /chos zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par
264b6(mdo sde): shes pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /chos zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang 'dus byas su rab tu gzhag pa la gnas pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /yang chos rjes su dran pa ni gang gis 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par
264b7(mdo sde): mthong ba ste/ yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par rig nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang de lta bu'i gnas ni yang dag pa'i chos kyi gnas so/ /gang gis de ltar mngon
265a1(mdo sde): par rtogs pa de ni chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa ni
265a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ de la chos gang yang kun du spyod pa med do/ /chos gang yang kun du spyod pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa gang
265a3(mdo sde): zhe na/ dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran par mi nus so/ /gang na lus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang yid kyi las kun du spyod pa med pa de ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni gdags pa dang tha snyad do/ /
265a4(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas ni gdags pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa'o/ /tha snyad thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba
265a5(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gtong pa zhes bya ba ni phung po thams cad 'dor zhing rab tu gtong ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des chos gang yang btang ba med do/ /'di ltar de la gang gtong ba'i chos gang yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di la gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni gtong
265a6(mdo sde): ba'i mchog go/ /gang mi 'dzin pa de ni mi gtong ngo / /gang mi gtong ba de ni mi snyems so/ /gang mi snyems pa de ni dmigs par mi byed do/ /dmigs par mi byed pa de la sems rgyu ba med do/ /rgyu ba med pa ni sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa'o/ /gang la sems kyis
265a7(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa med pa de ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o/ /gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba de ni thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa ste/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos
265b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /gang mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa ni rab tu gtong zhing byang chub tu 'ang bsngo ste/ de rjes su dran yang chos gang yang rjes su dran pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/ gang 'di gnyis
265b2(mdo sde): su med pa de yid la byed pa ci yang med do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar chos shes pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran
265b3(mdo sde): pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ zag pa med pa/ smon lam med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ brtul zhugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas te/
265b4(mdo sde): sems kyi dmigs pa'i gnas ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi rtsa ba ste/ spros pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /rnam par grol ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ste/ gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ /mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa ste/ gzugs snang ba ma yin no/ /nyon mongs pa zhi ba
265b5(mdo sde): ste/ so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te gang de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rnyog pa med pa de ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes
265b6(mdo sde): bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas
265b7(mdo sde): na 'khod pa rnams so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran no/ /yang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni spyi bo lta bu bcus rjes su dran te bcu gang zhe na/ pha
266a1(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi bor gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nang na mi nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sa thams cad kyi nang na dbang bskur ba'i sa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams
266a2(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin mi nyams pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i nang na don dang spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shes pa thams cad kyi nang na chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / dbang po thams cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la
266a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa shes pa dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la snang ba'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba dang / spyan thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun du gzigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi lag mthil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying
266a4(mdo sde): po la 'dug nas sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o zhes spyi bo lta bu'i chos rnam pa bcu po de dag gis rjes su dran no/ /de'i dran pa de ni lta bas ma 'khrugs/ bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang bas ma 'khrugs/ yid la
266a5(mdo sde): byed pas ma 'khrugs/ spros pas ma 'khrugs pa ste/ de lta bu'i dran pa rnyog pa med pas lha rjes su dran pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid
266a6(mdo sde): thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod pa yin zhe na/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa/ dmigs pa thams cad zhi ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi nying mtshams
266a7(mdo sde): sbyor ba med pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob cing / sngon gnas bcas pa'i snying rje chen po dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis ni rnam par rol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni shin tu byin gyis brlabs/ shes rab dang /
266b1(mdo sde): ye shes ni shin tu bsgoms/ mngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni bsgom pa yongs su dag /sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni gnas te/ nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor ba rab tu skyed pa'am/ 'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu spangs shing ye shes gang gis mya ngan las
266b2(mdo sde): 'das par ston pa de la dbang thob pas mi skye ba las skye zhing mi 'byung ba las 'byung ba ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang mi 'chad do/ /de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phrugs su
266b3(mdo sde): tshad zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/ ye shes kyi sgo gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i
266b4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa gang yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ 'di ni sngon gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go/ /gang yang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod du med pa de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis
266b5(mdo sde): mkhyen te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mi rig /byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis mi rig pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi shes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug ste/
266b6(mdo sde): spyod pa de'i gang ngo bo nyid dam/ gang mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dam/ byed rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/ zhe
266b7(mdo sde): sdang gi mtshan nyid dam/ gti mug gi mtshan nyid dam/ skal ba mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dam/ lha'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi'i mtshan nyid dam/
267a1(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ bar ma'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ nye ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/
267a2(mdo sde): spyod pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te ye shes thams cad la kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la
267a3(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid la rab tu 'jug
267a4(mdo sde): pa ji snyed pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod la gzud pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do/ /ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa mi zad cing mtha' med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang mi
267a5(mdo sde): zad cing mtha' med pa'o/ /chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba ni gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa nas/ gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang 'chad pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba de thams
267a6(mdo sde): cad ni de bzhin no/ /ma nor ba de bzhin no/ /gzhan ma yin pa'o/ /ci'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin nyid zhi ba la yang dag par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ don dam pa'i bden pa la yang dag par zhugs pa
267a7(mdo sde): de'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /ci'i phyir na gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ de bdag gi ngo bo nyid ma yin par gzhan du mi btsal te/ de'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa'o/ /yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni stong gsum
267b1(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams mang du thos pa kun dga' bo lta bur gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du yang yi ge khong du chud par mi nus so/ /yang don gcig tu bstan te ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta bu
267b2(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do/ /de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te ji ltar yi ge thams cad mi brjed cing don thams cad mi nyams par sems can thams cad mgu bar byed/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed/
267b3(mdo sde): bdud thams cad pham par byed/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad tshar gcod/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la chos dkon mchog rab tu sgrogs pa de ltar 'dzin to/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos
267b4(mdo sde): dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no/ /yang rigs kyi bu chos gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo bo nyid du byang chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung bar bya'o/ /yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs
267b5(mdo sde): rgyas she na/ yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / shin tu skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang / mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis
267b6(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sems chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul
267b7(mdo sde): gyis 'dod chags med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / grangs thams cad las 'das pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ de ltar rigs kyi bu tha snyad du gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la brten nas de 'dra bar chos de ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gang chos de'i
268a1(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni tshig gis brjod par mi nus so/ /de la chos rnams 'dzin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis kyang sems can gzhan rnams
268a2(mdo sde): dang / gang zag gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi khams ni thog ma nas rnam par dag pa ste/ de la sems
268a3(mdo sde): can rnams kyi rtsa ba'i dngos po med de/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongs su chad par rig nas sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de la bdag tu lta bar mi 'gyur/ sems can du lta bar ma yin/ srog tu lta bar ma yin/ gang zag tu lta bar
268a4(mdo sde): yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni phyin ci log ste/ rgyur lta ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa las sems can zhes brjod snyam mo/ /de la byang chub
268a5(mdo sde): sems dpas med pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ dngos po gang yang chud mi gzon to/ /sems can med cing sems can dben pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
268a6(mdo sde): thog ma nas rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud ce na/ tshul bzhin zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug
268a7(mdo sde): pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyen ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'bras bu mngon par 'grub bo/ /sbyin pa ni longs spyod chen po'i rgyu ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gtong ba de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshul
268b1(mdo sde): khrims ni lha dang mir skye ba'i rgyu ste/ lha dang mir skyes nas byang chub sems dpas sems can rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'dzud de/ tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ba de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
268b2(mdo sde): do/ /bzod pa dang des pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems brgyan pas byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin te/ phan par 'dod pa bzod pa'i gnas de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas
268b3(mdo sde): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /brtson 'grus ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpas brtson 'grus brtsams nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par grub
268b4(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bsam gtan ni sems dga' ba dang cang shes pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang cang shes pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun skong ste/
268b5(mdo sde): zhi gnas kyi tshogs de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /thos pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po ni dmigs par lta ba mi 'dzin cing dmigs pa med pa'i thos pa de yang
268b6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu gang dang gang bsags pa de dang de'i 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu dang rkyen de ni tshul bzhin
268b7(mdo sde): yid la byed pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba la chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin ni bdag yin te/ ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la bdag med do/ /ji ltar na bdag stong pa de bzhin du chos thams cad stong ngo / /ji ltar bdag ming
269a1(mdo sde): du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ming du btags pa tsam du zad do/ /de ltar tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro/ /gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
269a2(mdo sde): thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhe na/ 'di
269a3(mdo sde): la rigs kyi bu'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma bcom pas mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par yang 'gyur ro/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu
269a4(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas lta ba dang len pa thams cad med par mngon par shes pa bskyed de/ ye shes dang ldan/ shes rab dang ldan/ blo dang ldan/ bzod pa dang ldan/ tshul khrims dang ldan te/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing lus dben sems dben te/ 'di
269a5(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis nang nye bar 'gro zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ba/ yul med pa'i yul can/ cang shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtags pas brtags pa/ rab tu dkar ba'i blo nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs pa snang ba thob pa/ ye shes
269a6(mdo sde): rab rib med pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs bsags pa/ lhag mthong gi tshogs bsags pa/ sbyin pas brtan pa/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ bzod pa'i go gyon pa/ brtson 'grus kyi ya lad
269a7(mdo sde): bgos pa/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ byams pas rjes su 'thun pa/ snying rje la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas mngon par shes pa bskyed do/ /byang chub kyi snying po'i
269b1(mdo sde): bar du mngon par shes pa de dag gis shin du 'phags shing de mngon par shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ gzugs thams cad mthong / sgra thams cad thos/ sems thams cad la 'jug cing bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran te/ rdzu 'phrul
269b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa/ zag pa zad pa'i bde ba rnyed cing / yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ji snyed pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ des chos thams cad la de bzhin du lhun gyis grub par gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na
269b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba
269b4(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs
269b5(mdo sde): kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
269b6(mdo sde): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang yin pa de la
269b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o/ /de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas
270a1(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa 'gag / rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag /tshor ba
270a2(mdo sde): 'gags pas sred pa 'gag / sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /

270a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni chos kyi tshul zab mo la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin zhe na/ sems
270a5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo/ /rang gi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i mtshams sbyor ba shes so/ /gzhan yang zab mo zhes
270a6(mdo sde): bya ba ni 'jig tshogs dang / bdag rnam par dag pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni kun du btsal kyang mi dmigs so/ /gang mi dmigs pa de ni zab mo'o/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma brnyes
270a7(mdo sde): so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag thog ma nas kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du chos thams cad rnam par dag go/ /de ci'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la chos gang yang ma skyes/ ma skyed/ ma 'gags/ mi 'gag
270b1(mdo sde): pa ste/ de bas na rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa/ rab rib med pa/ don dam pa zab mo gang la mig med cing mig 'gog pa med pa nas yid kyi bar du med cing yid 'gog pa med pa ste/ de ni yul du bgrang ba ma yin no/ /gang
270b2(mdo sde): yul ma yin zhing yul byed pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir zab mo zhes bya'o/ /de la sems dang yid 'dzin pa med de rtogs par dka' ba mthong bar dka' ba khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing sems can gzhan la
270b3(mdo sde): yang rab tu ston te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no// //'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa/ bam po gsum pa/ rigs
270b4(mdo sde): kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang rten pa de ni ci yang ma yin pa/ gang
270b5(mdo sde): rten pa de ni dngos po med pa/ gang rten pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa/ gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba bdag med pa/ zhi ba/ gang rten pa de la ni bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gso ba med/ skyes bu med/ gang zag med/
270b6(mdo sde): shed las skyes med/ shed bu med/ gang rten pa de la ni yang dag par 'byung ba gang yang med/ gang rten pa de la ni ci yang med pa/ rtsol ba med pa/ stong pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ dben pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba ni chos kho na skye/ 'gag
270b7(mdo sde): pa ni chos kho na 'gag ste/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gso ba'am/ skyes bu'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu med ces bya'o/ /chos gang dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de dag la ni skye ba ci yang med cing bdag po med de/ de'i
271a1(mdo sde): phyir chos thams cad ni rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu zhes bya ste/ ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba na skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag pa na yang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du nang gi chos rnams skye ba na yang skyed par byed pa
271a2(mdo sde): med/ 'gag pa na yang 'gog par byed pa med de/ gzhan du na rkyen rnams yod na 'byung gi rkyen ma tshang na 'gog go snyam du sems te/ de ltar na shes pa la sbyor ba ni mthar lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo / /de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/ mtha' zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang rtag pa ste/ gang de
271a3(mdo sde): mi skyed cing rnam par mi 'jig pa ni chad pa dang rtag pa dang bral ba ste/ de'i phyir dag pas na mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral
271a4(mdo sde): ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa shes pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa de ni phyag rgya
271a5(mdo sde): ste/ phye ba med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ mngon par zhen pa med pa/ mi bskyod pa/ bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskyod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
271a6(mdo sde): ni phyag rgya des btab pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de ni shin tu mi skye ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dod chags
271a7(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya/ shin tu nam mkha'i phyag rgya ste/ dper na nam mkha' phyag rgya mi snang ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de yang spyan lnga la mi snang ste rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag
271b1(mdo sde): rgyas btab pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi tha snyad ji snyed du 'dogs pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa de bzhin du tha snyad 'dogs so/ /de la gang dag rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ba de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par byed do/ /gang dag rnam
271b2(mdo sde): par shes pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par mi byed/ chos tha dad du mi byed do/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas na de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par mi byed do/ /de la de bzhin nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na/ gang dag tha ma dang 'bring dang rab kyi chos
271b3(mdo sde): rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o/ /gang dag chos thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid tha dad mi byed do/ /gang ji snyed mang por brtags shing rnam par brtags kyang de bzhin nyid dbye bar mi nus te/ dper na sems can thams cad ni nam mkha' la
271b4(mdo sde): rnam par rgyu yang nam mkha'i khams ni 'brel par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sems can thams cad de bzhin nyid la rnam par rgyu yang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres par mi byed do/ /gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag
271b5(mdo sde): rgyas btab pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'dres par mi byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad las yang dag par gzhol ba yin zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni rdul thams
271b6(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings so/ /yang dag par bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'i dbyings so/ /ma byung ba'i phyir mi 'gog pa'i dbyings so/ /'gro ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gro ba'i dbyings so/ /rgal ba med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa'i
271b7(mdo sde): dbyings so/ /'byung ba med pa'i phyir gnas med pa'i dbyings so/ /dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbyings so/ /gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag gi dbyings so/ /don dam pa yin pa'i phyir gang zag med pa'i dbyings so/ /gnas med
272a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa med pa'i dbyings so/ /'dre ba med pa'i phyir kun gzhi med pa'i dbyings so/ /nges par gyur pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i dbyings so/ /rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings so/ /gnyen po med pa'i phyir mya
272a2(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos thams cad de ltar zhugs pas de la byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa'i gang ci smra ba dang brjod pa dang / ston pa de thams cad ni chos
272a3(mdo sde): kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa de 'dod chags kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyis su med par rab tu shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /zhe sdang gi
272a4(mdo sde): khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhe sdang ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gti mug gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gti mug ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /nyon
272a5(mdo sde): mongs pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings
272a6(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
272a7(mdo sde): gzugs med pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /mig gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis
272b1(mdo sde): su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /yid kyi

272b5(mdo sde): dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir chos thams cad rab
272b6(mdo sde): tu shes pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
272b7(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa bcu gnyis kyis na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi phyed pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi phyed pa dang / bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba mi phyed pa
273a1(mdo sde): dang / sbyin pa mi phyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mi phyed pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mi phyed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po mi phyed pa dang / sems can yongs
273a2(mdo sde): su smin par byed pa mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mi phyed pa dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba mi phyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas mi ngoms pa mi phyed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i phyir gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa mi phyed pa
273a3(mdo sde): dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor bar mi phyed pa dang / sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mi phyed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang
273a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu 'di dag las mi phyed pa de'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa yin no/ /'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs kyang bdag nyid ni mi phigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa
273a5(mdo sde): rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa yang sems can thams cad kyi bag la nyal dang / nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams sel kyang bdag nyid ni theg pa chen po 'di las mi phyed do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar
273a6(mdo sde): sra zhing mi phyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni yul ma
273a7(mdo sde): yin pa/ yul med pa yul thams cad las yongs su dag pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas rang gi yul yongs su sbyong ste/ de 'di snyam du mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni
273b1(mdo sde): su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni mig gi yul gang yang med do/ /rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring
273b2(mdo sde): ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni rna ba'i yul gang yang med do/ /sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
273b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni sna'i yul gang yang med do/ /lce'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni
273b4(mdo sde): dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lce'i yul gang yang med do/ /lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul
273b5(mdo sde): yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lus kyi yul gang yang med do/ /yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te dben
273b6(mdo sde): pa'i yul la ni yid kyi yul gang yang med do/ /phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis la yang de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pa nyid
273b7(mdo sde): kyi yul thams cad dben par 'jug go/ /rang gi zhing yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs pa de ni chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi yul dben par 'jug go/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul
274a1(mdo sde): chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i de bzhin du de yul thams cad la yang mi chags mi thogs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji
274a2(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs yongs su sbyang ba bya bas gzungs thob par gyur te/ de la gzungs yongs su sbyong ba byed pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sum cu rtsa gnyis
274a3(mdo sde): po 'di dag ni gzungs yongs su sbyong ba byed pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos pa dang / chos la gzhol ba dang / chos la bab pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la sten
274a4(mdo sde): cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la nga rgyal med cing btsun par gus par byed pa dang / chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / rjes su bsten pa rnams la bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag
274a5(mdo sde): rnams la ston pa tsam du sems shing 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang / kun 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa la le lo med pa dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med cing zang zing med par chos sbyin pa dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas thos pa dang tshul
274a6(mdo sde): bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor brtag pa'i phyir mang du thos pa mu med par byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa mu med par byas pa dang / rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang /
274a7(mdo sde): yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba drug mi 'dor ba dang / gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba'i las dang / bya ba
274b1(mdo sde): la 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sems nges par rtog pa la mi skrag pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun 'dzin pas yong mi 'chad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la sems zhum pa med pa dang / sems can la lta bas
274b2(mdo sde): snying rje che ba dang / chos la lta bas lus dang srog 'dor ba dang / ye shes la lta bas rtag tu nga rgyal med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ 'di ni gzungs yongs su sbyong ba byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la gzungs gang
274b3(mdo sde): zhe na/ gang kun bzung ba'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / dran pa rjes su dran pa dang / rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa dang / yi ge mi zad pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang /
274b4(mdo sde): spobs pa bstan pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob mi zad pa bstan pa shes pa dang / don dam pa dbyer med pa'i de kho na bstan
274b5(mdo sde): pa shes pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa nges pa shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i brtson 'grus mi 'god pa shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rol pa shes pa dang / dbang po'i rim pa shes
274b6(mdo sde): pa dang / stobs la gnas pa mi bskyod par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rtogs pa dang / 'thun pa shes pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i gnas shes pa dang / zhi gnas kyis sems gnas par shes pa dang / lhag mthong gis chos sgrol bar shes pa
274b7(mdo sde): dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed pa shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi so so ci rigs
275a1(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / sgra skad dang ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi brda ston pa shes pa dang / don dbyer med par shes pa dang / tshig 'bru mi zad par shes pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang / so so ci rigs
275a2(mdo sde): par chos ston pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dran pas 'dzin pa shes pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad mtshams sbyor ba'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs
275a3(mdo sde): pa shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos thams cad la snang ba rab rib med par shes pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o/ /lus dang ngag dang sems sa dang 'dra ba'i chos kun du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa ste/ chos kyi char 'bebs pa
275a4(mdo sde): dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed pa 'di ni gzungs kyi tshul la 'jug pa yin te/ gzungs thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi brjed par spyod par shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na
275a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po
275a6(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa mgyogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang /
275a7(mdo sde): zab mo la spobs pa dang / sna tshogs la spobs pa dang / legs par brgyan pa'i spobs pa dang / zhum pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / mdo dang rtogs pa
275b1(mdo sde): brjod pa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs pa dang / mi thul ba'i spobs pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs pa dang / spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang / tshig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs pa dang / chos ston pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i
275b2(mdo sde): spobs pa dang / lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs pa dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
275b3(mdo sde): snyoms kyi spobs pa dang / skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa yin te rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin no/ /de dag kyang yongs su sbyang ba bya ba
275b4(mdo sde): nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'grub ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma'i ngag mi gcog pas myur ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /tshur shog ces bya ba dang song zhes bya ba la g.yo med pas spobs pa mgyogs par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags pa med
275b5(mdo sde): pas spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de la ma chags par gnas pas spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /phra ma'i tshig med pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas zab mo la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /
275b6(mdo sde): sbyin pa sna tshogs bsags pas sna tshogs la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /chung ma legs par brgyan te rab tu byin pas legs par brgyan pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi sems las mi nyams pas zhum pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi
275b7(mdo sde): phung po legs par kun du bsrungs pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu sna tshogs byin pas tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang ldan
276a1(mdo sde): pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa sngon du 'gro bas mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang sngon byung ba la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal ba dang dbul ba dang mgon med pa la mi brnyas pas mi thul ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /gter
276a2(mdo sde): mi zad pa sbyin pa dang / pha rol chos la sbyor bas tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /tshig bden pa dang / tha ba med pa dang / ngag rtsub po med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pas spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /bla ma'i
276a3(mdo sde): tshig khyad du mi gsod pa dang gzhan gyi tshig mi gcog pas tshig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi yon tan gyi chos sgrub pas chos bstan pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag la mi stod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / phangs
276a4(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs par 'gyur ro/ /chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang / chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du ston pas the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /bstan bcos thams cad shes pa dang / gzhan la
276a5(mdo sde): mi gnod pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi nad g.yog byed pa dang / sman rab tu sbyin pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol la 'khrul pa'i skabs mi tshol ba dang / gzhan dag gi ltung ba mi gleng ba dang / 'khrul
276a6(mdo sde): pa la mi rtog pas 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par spyod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'god pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams
276a7(mdo sde): cad don du mi gnyer bas 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi spobs par 'gyur ro/ /bka' blo bde ba dang / des pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / sems dga' ba dang / gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par mi byed pas skye ba
276b1(mdo sde): dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po las mi nyams pa dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa dang / sems can la snying rje che ba dang / thams cad nan tan la 'god pas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs par
276b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /sems can gzhan la go bar byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can gzhan la nan tan du bya ba ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can gzhan gyi
276b3(mdo sde): sems dang 'thun par ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos dang yon tan dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /
276b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang 'chi 'pho dang 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba dang 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/
276b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang / lta ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa shes pa dang /
276b6(mdo sde): shes rab dang thabs zung du 'brel ba dang / mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa thob pa dang / ma skyes pa dang ma byung bar so sor rtog pa dang / bsams bzhin du skye ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can lta ba'i byams pa la sbyor ba dang / snying rje chen po la nges par
276b7(mdo sde): sems pa dang / chos la sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa dang / 'chi 'pho med par 'pho zhing skye ba dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos la 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log gi chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs
277a1(mdo sde): pa nas skye ste/ 'pho zhing 'byung la skye ba dang / 'pho ba dang / 'byung bar yang mi sems pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du skyes nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i skyes pa'i rabs bstan pa tshad med grangs med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad ni
277a2(mdo sde): rtsa ba gnyis la gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na
277a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing rtogs pas phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/ /
277a4(mdo sde): ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/ /byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pas lha'i bu'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/ /yang
277a5(mdo sde): des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin te/ des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ theg pa dman pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub kyi sems mi srung ba bdud kyi las dang / sems can tha
277a6(mdo sde): dad par sbyin pa bdud kyi las dang / skye ba la gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang / de la chags shing ro myong ba'i bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi chos ngan pa
277a7(mdo sde): la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba bdud kyi las dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su mi sngo ba bdud kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa la mi smod pa bdud kyi las dang / ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sdang ba bdud kyi las dang /
277b1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang / byams pa rgyun gcod pa bdud kyi las dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su mi tshol ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan par mi 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa bdud kyi las dang /
277b2(mdo sde): zang zing dang 'brel par chos ston pa bdud kyi las dang / thabs dang bral bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bdud kyi las dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po 'dor ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khong khro ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims dang ldan
277b3(mdo sde): pa rnams la mi gus pa bdud kyi las dang / nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i rjes su 'thun pa bdud kyi las dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang / dus ma yin par bsgrub pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / snying rje chen po bor nas rigs la rtog pa bdud
277b4(mdo sde): kyi las dang / 'dus ma byas 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus byas la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / sems sems can gyi ci bya'o cog la g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang / nga rgyal la gnas shing mi 'dud pa dang / lce gnyis smra ba dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / bcos ma la dga' ba
277b5(mdo sde): dang / mi drang ba dang / rtsub cing brlang ba dang / sdig pa la mi smod pa dang / chos kyi drungs 'byin pa dang / thos pa cung zad tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / chos ma yin pa don du gnyer ba dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par mi
277b6(mdo sde): gnon pa bdud kyi las dang / sems kyi dri ma mi rtog pa bdud kyi las dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma la mi mjed pa bdud kyi las te/ rigs kyi bu ji tsam du mi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i chos 'dor ba de thams cad ni bdud kyi las so/ /chos bzhis ni bdud kyi las 'di
277b7(mdo sde): dag las shin tu 'da' ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag dang / dad pa dang brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la gnas te sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / chos kyi tshul zab mo la gnas
278a1(mdo sde): te dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
278a2(mdo sde): bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/ 'byung po rnams la snying rje bar gnas pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la de la ma chags
278a3(mdo sde): par gnas pa yin/ slong ba rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/ bsod nams dag gis longs spyod mi zad pa yin/ bsam pa dag pas lag na rin po che yin/ mthon dman gyi yid med pas sems sa dang mtshungs pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag
278a4(mdo sde): pas bsam pa 'byor ba yin/ mchod sbyin thams cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgrib pa med pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro bas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa
278a5(mdo sde): yin no/ /ji ltar phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa de bzhin du bdag gi nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cig /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / chos shes pa la mkhas pa
278a6(mdo sde): gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ma yin par ma gyur cig ces de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu
278a7(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i bya ba shes pas stobs bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar
278b1(mdo sde): phyin pa yin/ /zag pa zad pa'i bya ba shes pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi snang ba thob pas
278b2(mdo sde): spyan lnga yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pas mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcad pas dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba tshar phyin pa yin/ bsod
278b3(mdo sde): nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dbang bskur ba thob pas sa bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sangs rgyas
278b4(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgya
278b5(mdo sde): mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can rnams kyi gzugs snang ba ji snyed par de dag thams cad dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rgya mtsho chen po la yod de/
278b6(mdo sde): de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems su snang ba'am/ gzugs su snang ba'am/ sgrar snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' snang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i
278b7(mdo sde): phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni ro gcig pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos la rnam par grol ba'i ror shes pas ro gcig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol ba yin no/ /de
279a1(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sor rtog pas byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las mi yol lo/ /'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa thams
279a2(mdo sde): cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu thams cad zad pas bri ba'am gang ba med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos thams cad zad pas chos kyi dbyings bri ba'am gang
279a3(mdo sde): bar mi byed do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni kha tshon tshad med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zab cing nyan
279a4(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can tshad med pa'i gnas yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa'i gnas yin no/ /'di ni rgya mtsho'i
279a5(mdo sde): phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin
279a6(mdo sde): zhe na/ chags pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la lta ba kun nas ldang ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni lta ba kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na rlung mar ni nam mkha'i dkyil na mi chags
279a7(mdo sde): so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa yang sems can thams cad la mi chags so/ /yang skyes bu dam pa de dag ni spyod pa dang / cho ga'i tshul shes pa yin te/ de la cho ga ni dran pa'o/ /spyod pa ni rnam par mi g.yeng ba'o/ /de dag ni mun pa dang
279b1(mdo sde): bral zhing snang ba thob pa yang yin te de la mun pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la mi shes pa'o/ /snang ba zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la ye shes thogs pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir de dag mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gis
279b2(mdo sde): ye shes thob pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag rang byung gi ye shes la mngon par gnas shing sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs pa'i ye shes bstan pa 'di la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gis ye shes thob
279b3(mdo sde): par gyur pa de'i tshe myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang zhig lta ba kun las sems dben zhing / /mkhas pa bsod nams tshogs ni rab byed la/ /mtshan ma ldang ba yongs su spangs
279b4(mdo sde): nas su/ /byang chub phyir bsngos de ni zad mi 'gyur/ /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal kun spangs nas/ /de ni ye shes tshogs rnams tshol bar byed/ /mtha' yas blo ldan nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /kun mkhyen ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa/ /gzugs
279b5(mdo sde): dang mtshan gyi chos su ma yin te/ /gang na sems dang yid ni mi rgyu ba/ /de ni 'thun par sangs rgyas rjes su dran/ /chos ni 'dod chags bral zhing rang bzhin dben/ /zhi zhing rab zhi rtag tu mtshan ma med/ /gang zhig dmigs pa thams cad bral gyur pa/ /de 'dir chos ni rjes su dran pa
279b6(mdo sde): yin/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin tu 'dus ma byas/ /stong pa mtshan med smon lam rnam par grol/ /de la sems med dran dang 'jug pa med/ /de ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yin/ /phung po yongs su btang ba thams cad gtong / /nyon mongs dngos po thams cad legs par
279b7(mdo sde): 'dor/ /snyems pa med cing rtog dang rnam rtog dag /'di ni gtong ba legs par rjes su dran/ /tshul khrims zag pa med cing 'dus ma byas/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa med/ /'byung ba med cing srid gsum mi gnas pa/ /de ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yin/ /lha gang
280a1(mdo sde): dag cing dri med nyon mongs med/ /dga' ldan gnas pa dbang bskur thob gyur pa/ /sems can dag pa de dag 'di dran zhing / /bdag kyang myur du de 'drar 'gyur snyam sems/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa ni/ /nyon mongs dngos po thams cad 'dzin mi
280a2(mdo sde): byed/ /chos dang chos min gnyis las rnam par grol/ /de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin/ /rgyal bas byang chub mtshan nyid gang brnyes pa/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzin cing / /gang gis rdul med mtha' 'dir rab shes pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin
280a3(mdo sde): yin/ /bdag ni rab tu dag pas sems can dag /chos kun dag par mkhas pa sus rtogs pa/ /de ni sems dag rang bzhin 'od gsal te/ /sems can gtang phyir rtag tu yongs smin byed/ /sems can khams rnams ma rung mi byed cing / /de ni bri zhing gang bar mthong
280a4(mdo sde): ba med/ /lta ba nor ba rab tu spang bar ston/ /de 'dra de ni sems can mang po sbyong / /'jig rten yul kun rab tu gang ston pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas yul ni nam mkha' mtshungs pa ste/ /de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes/ /sgra skad
280a5(mdo sde): dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni/ /brag ca 'dra bar de yis rab mthong zhing / /de la nyan pa'ang shin tu yod min par/ /de ltar rab tu shes pa gzungs thob bo/ /kun du 'dzin dang 'dzin cing klog pa dang / /chos rnams bstan pa'i rnam pa rab bshad kyis/ /bdag dang sems
280a6(mdo sde): can chos su rlom sems med/ /de ni gzungs la rab tu gnas pa yin/ /rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa 'dzin byed cing / /legs par gsungs pas sems can tshim byed pa/ /dran dang ting nge 'dzin dang bral mi 'gyur/ /gzungs la nges pa'i yon tan 'di dag go/ /chos ni
280a7(mdo sde): rnam pa kun du bsags med pas/ /chos la mi 'phro 'phros pa med pa'ang min/ /dper na klu ni char rgyun 'bebs pa ltar/ /de ltar de yang chos kyi char pa 'bebs/ /yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ /thogs med rgyun chags rgyun chad mi 'gyur bar/ /mdo
280b1(mdo sde): sde stong phrag bye ba rab du 'chad/ /sems can dbang por sems can 'du shes med/ /sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong du/ /rgyun mi 'chad par chos ni rab ston cing / /bsam pa ji bzhin sems can tshim par byed/ /spobs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas yon tan gnas/ /chos 'di
280b2(mdo sde): thams cad nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes/ /gang gis chos rnams kun gyi tshul shes la/ /sems can srog dang gang zag mi 'dzin pa/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos 'dzin/ /sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das/ /de dag de ltar kun du skye ba med/ /su yi bzod pa 'di 'dra'i 'od
280b3(mdo sde): gsal ba/ /de ni bstan pa 'di la bag yod yin/ /phung po yang dag sgyu ma lta bur mthong / /chos dbyings ji 'dra de bzhin khams rnams shes/ /dbang po drug ni grong stong 'dra mthong ba/ /de ni phung po'i bdud las yang dag 'da'/ /sprin brtsegs phung po lta bur nyon mongs rnams/ /bag
280b4(mdo sde): yod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing / /chos la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa/ /de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag 'da'/ /gang zhig skye ba rtag tu skye med shes/ /'di la gang yang 'pho med 'gro ba med/ /chos rnams 'ong med song ba med shes pa/ /de ni 'chi bdag bdud kyi dbang mi 'gro/ /
280b5(mdo sde): gang zhig g.yo dang rlom sems mi byed cing / /byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes med/ /bdag dang sems can med kyang snying rje 'jug /de ni dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul lo/ /rnam shes ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthong / /'dus byas mi gnas 'dus ma byas la
280b6(mdo sde): min/ /'gro ba'i sems ni sgyu ma 'drar mthong ba/ /de ni sems dpa'i rdzi ba med pa yin/ /pha rol tshu rol gang la'ang mi chags la/ /chos ldan gru ni yang dag su sbyor zhing / /sems can sgrol yang sems can 'du shes med/ /mnyam pa zhes bya byang chub sems dpa' de/ /srid pa gsum
280b7(mdo sde): po 'brog dgon 'dra ba dang / /stong par 'gyur ba med par rab shes shing / /lam gyi rim gyis rtag tu sems can sgrol/ /de ni ded dpon bdud rtsi lam ston pa/ mdzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshul min mkhas/ /chos rnams gdod nas stong par rab tu shes/ /tshul dang rigs pas mya ngan 'das la 'dzud/ /
281a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren ces bya/ /sems kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur/ /sems ni sems la nams kyang mtshams mi sbyor/ /'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dren ces bya/ /nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang chu zla ltar/ /chos
281a2(mdo sde): rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag ces/ /nyon mongs kun dang 'dre bar mi byed pa/ /sems can dag pa de ni ma smad pa/ /gang zhig chos gcig gis ni chos rnams kun/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra bar gzung med dang / /gsog dang dang rtag pa med par shes/ /de ni byang chub snying por
281a3(mdo sde): myur du 'gro/ /chos gtan la 'bebs pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni
281a4(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to/ /lha brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dag
281a5(mdo sde): kyang dkrol nas/ 'di skad ces gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul du rjes su dong ba yin no/ /gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas pa rnams kyis
281a6(mdo sde): rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na chos 'di lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom
281a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod mngon du rangs par mdzad pas/ mu tig gi dra ba 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa stong gsum yongs su gang ba ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol nas bcom ldan 'das
281b1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes ni chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ bstan pa 'di ni rgyun mi 'chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs shing dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes
281b2(mdo sde): la mkhas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshims par gyur to/ /theg pa chen po 'di yang rgyas par rjod pa mdzad par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la
281b3(mdo sde): yang chos kyi snang ba chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la yang chos 'byung ba'i sgo bstan pas chos 'byung ba'i sgo des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma mchis pa bstan par bgyi'o// //'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus
281b4(mdo sde): pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur bar spobs pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyi ming nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba
281b5(mdo sde): de/ ci nam mkha' khyod kyi mdzod dam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ nam mkha' ni kho bo'i mdzod do/ /myur bar spobs pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nam mkha' mdzod kyi bye brag bdag cag gis kyang blta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
281b6(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi khyad par ston cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la gang 'dod pa de kho bos nam mkha' las
281b7(mdo sde): char dbab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ud pa la'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba na/ 'od thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad ma rgya ni rgyang grags kyi tshad/ 'dab ma bye ba stong phrag
282a1(mdo sde): mang po 'jam zhing gzhon pa/ gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dris ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab pa/ kha dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa/ mthong na yid du 'ong zhing chog mi shes pa/ pad ma de mthong ba dang dri bsnams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin thob par
282a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de bdag gis mthong ste/ 'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad ma'i char phob shig snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pas bsams ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha'i ngos las de 'dra ba'i pad ma'i char mngon par
282a3(mdo sde): phab ste/ de nas 'khor de dag thams cad pad ma de dag gi dri mthong zhing tshor bas dga' ba'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'khor de thams cad ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /
282a4(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ye shes kyi stobs legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la
282a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las gser phye'i char phob shig /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pas tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i mod la nam mkha' las gser phye'i char mngon par phab bo/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pas
282a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char phob shig /tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la phyogs bcu nas ri rab kyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che grangs med dpag tu med pa ming tha dad pa kha dog tha dad pa
282a7(mdo sde): yod pa de dag gi char chen po mngon par phab pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai dUr+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / dpal gyi snying po'i ze ba can dang / dri med dang / rin chen byi ru dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / me shel dang / snang byed dang / 'od mchog dang / 'dzam gling 'od dang / me
282b1(mdo sde): 'od dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / an da rnyil dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / rab tu zhi ba'i 'od dang / chu 'od dang / chu mdog dang / chu dang bar byed dang / sa'i 'od dang / mi phyed pa'i gnas dang / mig mi bzod pa dang / brgya byin thogs pa dang / rgyal ba dang / cher rgyal ba dang / gzi brjid 'bar
282b2(mdo sde): ba dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje'i ze ba can dang / 'jig rten snang ba dang / skar ma dga' dang / 'od 'dzin dang / zla gam dang / 'dzam bu'i chu 'od dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'od dang / 'od stong ldan dang / skar mda'i sgo dang / me'i 'od dang / rgyal bas brgyan pa dang / tsha ba zhi byed dang / gdung ba
282b3(mdo sde): med dang / nad sel dang / mig sbyong dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sbyong dang / yan lag rnam par snang ba dang / rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang / 'od sngon po dang / 'od ser po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rin po che'i dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa
282b4(mdo sde): dang / ming de lta bu dang / ming de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i char rab tu phab ste/ nor bu rin po che de dag gi ming ni bskal par yang zad par sla ba ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dus kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
282b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can sdug bsngal zhing dbul ba/ zas dang skom med pa/ gcer bu gos med pa/ gos ral po gyon pa dang / rnams bkres shing skom pas yongs su zin pa/ gcer bu rang gi skras yog pa/ mchil ma dang
282b6(mdo sde): ngar snabs dang / khrag dang / rnag za 'dod pa de lta bu'i sems can de dag bskyab pa'i phyir zas dang / skom dang / gos kyi char khyod kyis phob shig /de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag
282b7(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang / btung ba thams cad kyi char gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /gos kha dog du ma dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du ma dang / phra zhing 'jam pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i
283a1(mdo sde): char rab tu phab ste/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkren pa dang / dbul po thams cad dang / thams cad kun tshim par byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'

286b6(mdo sde): sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i
286b7(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu
287a1(mdo sde): phyin pa yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su dag
287a2(mdo sde): pas byams pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa nas/ snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su sbyangs so/ /de bzhin du lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems
287a3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa ste/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongs su dag pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su sbyangs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad nas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongs su dag pas dge ba'i
287a4(mdo sde): rtsa ba'i bar du des/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su dag pas nam mkha'i mdzod 'di yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis yongs su sbyangs so/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis nam mkha'
287a5(mdo sde): las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston te/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la zad pa med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pas gang la yang zad pa med do/ /des na 'di nam mkha' mdzod ces bya'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang
287a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' khri longs spyod mi zad pa dang / lag na rin po che dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam yongs su bskang ba'i bzod pa skyes so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
287a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu bdag cag gis nam mkha' las chos bsgrags pa'i mdzod mnyan to/ /nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par 'dug la/ nam mkha' 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed cig dang / chos mnyan pa'i mdzod thos
287b1(mdo sde): so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang 'khor de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar nas nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i
287b2(mdo sde): yid rnams kyi/ /thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yin/ /de la 'jug pa'i rab bstan gyis/ /khyed cag mthar gyis mnyan par gyis/ /nam mkha' la ni mtho ba med/ /dma' ba'ang yod pa ma yin te/ /gang gi chos nyid mtho dma' med/ /de la 'dud pa ga la yod/ /nam mkha'
287b3(mdo sde): la ni skye ba med/ /'gog pa dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /de la rnam par rtog pa med/ /nam mkha' la ni bri ba med/ /gang ba dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /chos rnams gang med bri med de/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo/ /nam mkha' la ni
287b4(mdo sde): mun pa med/ /de ni de yis snyon mi smongs/ /sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ /de bas nams kyang snyon smongs med/ /nyi zla yi ni 'od zer gyis/ /nam mkha' dga' bar mi 'gyur te/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang / /gang la'ang dga' bar 'gyur ba
